Text: 山越人乃是部落民族，比較不習慣定居在漢人奢侈委靡的城邑中，而習慣在野外紮營度日。雖然這支山地部族並非遊牧民族，但仍較倚重農牧。\\n\\n此族人在紮營地既可自給自足，也能有效準備兵力，應對北方持續加重的入侵威脅。
English: Being a tribal people, the Shanyue are unused to the urban and decadent cities of the Han and prefer a life in encamped in the wilderness. Although not nomadic, the hill tribes are nevertheless a more pastoral, agricultural peoples. \\n\\n From their camps, they can both tend to their needs as a people and prepare themselves, militarily, for the ever-present and increasing threat of invasion from the North.
Vanilla: 山越人乃是部落民族，比較不習慣定居在漢人奢侈委靡的城邑中，而習慣在野外紮營度日。雖然這支山地部族並非遊牧民族，但仍較倚重農牧。\\n\\n此族人在紮營地既可自給自足，也能有效準備兵力，應對北方持續加重的入侵威脅。
Exact: 山越人乃是部落民族，比較不習慣定居在漢人奢侈委靡的城邑中，而習慣在野外紮營度日。雖然這支山地部族並非遊牧民族，但仍較倚重農牧。\\n\\n此族人在紮營地既可自給自足，也能有效準備兵力，應對北方持續加重的入侵威脅。

Text: 江南一直都是山越族人的家園，他們也希望今後維持不變。這便是他們生存意義所在的真理，也是在諸侯割據的時代，他們必須奮戰保護的傳統。\\n\\n山越人比誰都瞭解南方的山區，並在這嶙峋之地建起了堡壘城寨；這裡遠離殘酷的風雨、也遠離敵人的監視，是他們生活成長之地。
English: The Southlands have long been the home of the Shanyue tribes, and it is their ardent hope that it always will be. This is the truth by which they live, and one they must fight to protect as warlords begin to encroach. \\n\\n The Shanyue know the hills of the South better than any, and amidst the striking scenery, their fortresses rise: places to live and grow, away from both the extremities of the elements and the eyes of the enemy.
Exact: 江南一直都是山越族人的家園，他們也希望今後維持不變。這便是他們生存意義所在的真理，也是在諸侯割據的時代，他們必須奮戰保護的傳統。\\n\\n山越人比誰都瞭解南方的山區，並在這嶙峋之地建起了堡壘城寨；這裡遠離殘酷的風雨、也遠離敵人的監視，是他們生活成長之地。

Text: 「此處乃我等地盤、我等家園、我等基業。斷不能讓你們奪走！」
English: This is our land, our home, our history. You cannot have it!
Vanilla: 「此處乃我等地盤、我等家園、我等基業。斷不能讓你們奪走！」
Exact: 「此處乃我等地盤、我等家園、我等基業。斷不能讓你們奪走！」

Text: 雖然山越人不得不建起柵欄保護自己，但其實他們只想和平度日。
English: Although their palisade walls are an unfortunate necessity, the Shanyue seek only to live in peace.
Vanilla: 雖然山越人不得不建起柵欄保護自己，但其實他們只想和平度日。
Exact: 雖然山越人不得不建起柵欄保護自己，但其實他們只想和平度日。

Text: [[b]]對抗騎兵加成[[/b]]\\n\\n 提高對騎兵的近戰傷害。
English: [[b]]BONUS VS. CAVALRY[[/b]]\\n\\n Increases melee damage against cavalry.
Mapped by text: [[b]]對抗騎兵加成[[/b]]\\n\\n 提高對騎兵的近戰傷害。

Text: [[b]]近戰命中加成[[/b]]\\n\\n 通過降低敵人的近戰回避，增加單位在任何時候的命中率。
English: [[b]]MELEE HIT BONUS[[/b]]\\n\\n Increases a unit's hit chance at all times by decreasing the enemy's melee evasion.
Mapped by text: [[b]]近戰命中加成[[/b]]\\n\\n 通過降低敵人的近戰回避，增加單位在任何時候的命中率。

Text: [[b]]近戰迴避[[/b]]\\n\\n 此能力值會提高閃避正面與側面近戰傷害的機率。敵人的衝鋒加成會降低此能力值。
English: [[b]]MELEE EVASION[[/b]]\\n\\n Increases the chance of evading melee damage from front and side. The enemy's charge bonus decreases it.
Mapped by text: [[b]]近戰迴避[[/b]]\\n\\n 此能力值會提高閃避正面與側面近戰傷害的機率。敵人的衝鋒加成會降低此能力值。

Text: [[b]]護甲[[/b]]\\n\\n 減少單位受到的標準近戰傷害、遠程傷害以及爆炸傷害。無法防禦穿甲傷害。
English: [[b]]ARMOUR[[/b]]\\n\\n Decreases standard melee, ranged and explosion damages. Doesn't help against armour-piercing damage.
Mapped by text: [[b]]護甲[[/b]]\\n\\n 減少單位受到的標準近戰傷害、遠程傷害以及爆炸傷害。無法防禦穿甲傷害。

Text: 孫策勢力中每位人物在達到5級后均會與他分享專長點。在9級、12級和15級時他們分別會產生一個額外的點數。
English: Each character in Sun Ce's faction grants him shared expertise points once they reach rank 5. At ranks 9, 12 and 15 they generate one extra point respectively.
Mapped by text: 孫策勢力中每位人物在達到5級后均會與他分享專長點。在9級、12級和15級時他們分別會產生一個額外的點數。

Text: 黃巾匪徒已被擊潰。青州生還者們願意報德。曹操將之收於旗下，名爲青州軍。
English: The yellow turban warband is crushed. Hailing from Qingzhou, the survivors offer their servitude. Cao Cao gathers them under his banner and dubs them Qingzhou Troops.
Mapped by text: 黃巾匪徒已被擊潰。青州生還者們願意報德。曹操將之收於旗下，名爲青州軍。

English: Perhaps you can bring them into your fold...

Text: 有黃巾軍侵入主公領地，須從速討敵。
English: A yellow turban warband has invaded your territory. You must defeat them.
Mapped by text: 有黃巾軍侵入主公領地，須從速討敵。

Text: 諸葛亮精心設計出一種新武器。這是一種能夠同時射出多枚箭矢的弩弓，可以壓制敵人。
English: Zhuge Liang has brilliantly engineered a new weapon. It is a crossbow that fires several bolts simultaneously to overwhelm the enemy.
Mapped by text: 諸葛亮精心設計出一種新武器。這是一種能夠同時射出多枚箭矢的弩弓，可以壓制敵人。

Text: 羌人部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。
English: Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Qiang barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.

Text: 難以置信，但不妨親自調查一番。
English: It's hard to believe, but it might be worth investigating personally.
Mapped by text: 難以置信，但不妨親自調查一番。

Text: 附近村莊有傳聞說，每晚會有巨獸出沒恐嚇農民。村民們在找尋一位英雄來進山驅走怪獸。
English: There's a rumor about a nearby village. Each night, a huge monster terrorises the peasants. The villagers seek a hero to comb the mountains and drive out the beast.
Override by key: 附近村莊有傳聞說，每晚會有巨獸出沒恐嚇農民。村民們在找尋一位英雄來進山驅走怪獸。

Text: 你同意下人的意見，準備下山。
English: You agree with your men and prepare to descend.
Mapped by text: 你同意下人的意見，準備下山。

Text: 在您與部下開始搜山幾天後，您遇到了一個不可思議的景象：一隻巨型白虎的巢穴。您的部下被老虎體型嚇到，懇求您回去。您感覺好像那隻巨大的老虎正在盯著你。
English: A few days after you and your men began searching the mountains, you come across an incredible sight. The den of a large white tiger and its family. The men are intimidated by its size and implore you to go back. You feel as if the massive tiger is staring at you.
Override by key: 在您與部下開始搜山幾天後，您遇到了一個不可思議的景象：一隻巨型白虎的巢穴。您的部下被老虎體型嚇到，懇求您回去。您感覺好像那隻巨大的老虎正在盯著你。

Text: 酣戰之後，您殺死了巨型白虎。然而出乎意料的是，其它老虎俯伏在您身前，好像屈服於您的力量！這些白虎似乎不是普通的野獸。
English: After an epic struggle, you slay the enormous white tiger. Then, unexpectedly, the other tigers prostrate themselves as if submitting to your might! These white tigers don't seem to be ordinary beasts.
Override by key: 酣戰之後，您殺死了巨型白虎。然而出乎意料的是，其它老虎俯伏在您身前，好像屈服於您的力量！這些白虎似乎不是普通的野獸。

Text: 您放棄了狩獵，回去了。然而不知爲何，怪獸從此不再攻擊。
English: You give up the hunt and return. However, for reasons unknown, the monster attacks stopped.
Mapped by text: 您放棄了狩獵，回去了。然而不知爲何，怪獸從此不再攻擊。

Text: 不應理睬這些煩人的佈道僧侶。
English: It's best to ignore these annoying preachers.
Mapped by text: 不應理睬這些煩人的佈道僧侶。

Text: 從船上下來一群剃光頭的異人。他們自稱從遙遠地方來此傳播佛道。也許值得支持他們？
English: A group of unusual men sporting shaved heads disembark from a ship.  They claim to have journeyed from distant lands to spread the teachings of Buddha. Perhaps it will be worth supporting them?
Mapped by text: 從船上下來一群剃光頭的異人。他們自稱從遙遠地方來此傳播佛道。也許值得支持他們？

Text: 亂世出豪傑。新進的一名隨從可管理一隻特殊軍隊。
English: This age of strife breeds men with a talent for warfare. A follower who has recently joined the faction can assume the role of managing an exclusive unit.
Mapped by text: 亂世出豪傑。新進的一名隨從可管理一隻特殊軍隊。

Text: 自西域而來的粟特商人出現在我方境内。我們很快就能買到精美商品，或者雇傭粟特傭兵。
English: Sogdians from the west has been spotted entering our borders. We will be able to purchase fine goods or hire Sogd mercenaries soon.
Mapped by text: 自西域而來的粟特商人出現在我方境内。我們很快就能買到精美商品，或者雇傭粟特傭兵。

Text: 的確，西域商人帶來的貨物種類繁多，其中不乏珍惜名貴之物。而且，護送他們的傭兵看起來就像是天生的戰士。
English: Indeed, the goods brought by the western merchants are diverse, with many rare and valuable items. Furthermore, the mercenaries escorting them look like natural warriors.
Mapped by text: 的確，西域商人帶來的貨物種類繁多，其中不乏珍惜名貴之物。而且，護送他們的傭兵看起來就像是天生的戰士。

Text: 你決定不買他們的貨品。
English: You decide not to avail yourself of their wares.
Mapped by text: 你決定不買他們的貨品。

Text: 您被一柄怪劍吸引住了。
English: You are rather taken with a peculiar sword.
Mapped by text: 您被一柄怪劍吸引住了。

Text: 您被一匹好馬吸引住了。
English: You are rather taken with a fine steed.
Mapped by text: 您被一匹好馬吸引住了。

Text: 您雇傭了一隊粟特傭兵。
English: You hire a Sogdian mercenary group.
Mapped by text: 您雇傭了一隊粟特傭兵。

Text: 信使來報，有商販在匈奴營中發現一位中土女眷，正是名士蔡邕之女蔡琰，已沦为匈奴左賢王女奴。匈奴王或許願意放了蔡琰，你的一個探子已經前去調查……
English: Your messengers report a remarkable story. A trader spotted a Han woman living amongst the Xiongnu and identified her as Cai Yan, the daughter of the grand scholar Cai Yong. It seems she was forced to marry a chieftain of the Xiongnu. Perhaps someone could convince this chieftain to free Cai Yan. One of your scouts has already left to investigate...
Override by key: 信使來報，有商販在匈奴營中發現一位中土女眷，正是名士蔡邕之女蔡琰，已沦为匈奴左賢王女奴。匈奴王或許願意放了蔡琰，你的一個探子已經前去調查……

Text: 吾人已與匈奴聯係，被綁架的女子確爲已被匈奴王納爲小妾的蔡琰。匈奴提議，可以重金將此女贖回。
English: We have contacted the Xiongnu and verified that the kidnapped woman is indeed Cai Yan. She has become the concubine of a Xiongnu chieftain. However, the Xiongnu offer to release Cai Yan for a significant sum of gold.
Mapped by text: 吾人已與匈奴聯係，被綁架的女子確爲已被匈奴王納爲小妾的蔡琰。匈奴提議，可以重金將此女贖回。

English: You do not make deals with barbarians.
Cai Yan is free once more.

Text: 一名西涼校尉加入您的勢力。
English: A Xiliang colonel has joined your faction.
Mapped by text: 一名西涼校尉加入您的勢力。

Text: 您現在可以招募：西涼單位
English: You may now recruit Xiliang units
Mapped by text: 您現在可以招募：西涼單位

Text: 您獲得一張可指揮荊楚部隊的兵符。
English: You have acquired a tally that grants its bearer the authority to command Jingchu troops.
Mapped by text: 您獲得一張可指揮荊楚部隊的兵符。

Text: 您現在可以招募：荊楚單位
English: You may now recruit Jingchu units
Mapped by text: 您現在可以招募：荊楚單位

Text: 您獲得一張可指揮丹陽部隊的兵符。
English: You have acquired a tally that grants its bearer the authority to command Danyang troops.
Mapped by text: 您獲得一張可指揮丹陽部隊的兵符。

Text: 您現在可以招募：丹陽單位
English: You may now recruit Danyang units
Mapped by text: 您現在可以招募：丹陽單位

Text: 我們從附近游牧民族召集戰士，組成了一支强健騎兵。這些令人可畏的鐵甲騎兵將衝垮你的敵人。
English: We have gathered warriors from nearby nomadic peoples to form a powerful cavalry unit. These formidable cataphracts will crush your enemies.
Mapped by text: 我們從附近游牧民族召集戰士，組成了一支强健騎兵。這些令人可畏的鐵甲騎兵將衝垮你的敵人。

Text: 您現在可以招募：鐵拳騎兵
English: You may now recruit Ironfist Cavalry
Mapped by text: 您現在可以招募：鐵拳騎兵

Text: 由於您對學者和人才的贊助，您的官員在啓蒙的道路上取得了進步。
English: Thanks to your patronage of scholars and men of talent, your officers have made progress on the path to enlightenment.
Mapped by text: 由於您對學者和人才的贊助，您的官員在啓蒙的道路上取得了進步。

Text: 您的一些官員獲得額外經驗。
English: A few of your officers have gained additional experience.
Mapped by text: 您的一些官員獲得額外經驗。

Text: 淳于瓊終於想通了！他不再是個酒鬼，而是個能帶兵的將領。
English: Chunyu Qiong finally came to his senses! He is no longer a drunkard but a general who can lead an army.
Mapped by text: 淳于瓊終於想通了！他不再是個酒鬼，而是個能帶兵的將領。

Text: 解鎖精銳北軍校尉隨從
English: Unlocks elite Northern Army Captain Retinues
Mapped by text: 解鎖精銳北軍校尉隨從

Text: 鑒於您近期勢如破竹，北軍中候已宣誓效忠於您。他所指揮的精良軍隊也隨同前來，加入您麾下。
English: Following your recent success, the captain of the Northern Army has come to pledge his devotion to you. He brings with him the might of the professional soldiers he commands.
Mapped by text: 鑒於您近期勢如破竹，北軍中候已宣誓效忠於您。他所指揮的精良軍隊也隨同前來，加入您麾下。

Text: 領軍的校尉掌管北軍世兵，現已效忠于公孫瓚。這是支不可小觑的部隊。
English: The captain of the centre, inspector of the professional Northern Army, has pledged his allegiance to Gongsun Zan. He now has a formidable force at his disposal.
Mapped by text: 領軍的校尉掌管北軍世兵，現已效忠于公孫瓚。這是支不可小觑的部隊。

English: The captain of the centre, inspector of the professional Northern Army, has pledged his allegiance to Yuan Shu. He now has a formidable force at his disposal.

Text: 一隻殘軍請求加入您的勢力。呂布戰敗後，其女呂姬收攏潰卒。然而，接納他們可能會惹惱呂布之敵。
English: A shabby warband requests to join your faction. After Lu Bu's defeat, his daughter Lu Ji seems to have been leading the survivors. However, granting them sanctuary may cause their enemies to come after us.
Mapped by text: 一隻殘軍請求加入您的勢力。呂布戰敗後，其女呂姬收攏潰卒。然而，接納他們可能會惹惱呂布之敵。

Text: 一隻殘軍請求加入您的勢力。袁術戰敗後，其部將張勳，紀靈及閻象收攏潰卒。然而，接納他們可能會惹惱袁術之敵。
English: A shabby warband requests to join your faction. After Yuan Shu's defeat, his generals Zhang Xun, Ji Ling and Yan Xiang to have been leading the survivors. However, granting them sanctuary may cause their enemies to come after us.
Mapped by text: 一隻殘軍請求加入您的勢力。袁術戰敗後，其部將張勳，紀靈及閻象收攏潰卒。然而，接納他們可能會惹惱袁術之敵。

English: You allow them to join your cause.
You allow them to join your cause.

Text: 鑒於您近期勢如破竹，北軍中候已宣誓效忠於您。他所指揮的精良軍隊也隨同前來，加入您麾下。
English: Following your recent success, the captain of the Northern Army has come to pledge his devotion to you. He brings with him the might of the professional soldiers he commands.
Mapped by text: 鑒於您近期勢如破竹，北軍中候已宣誓效忠於您。他所指揮的精良軍隊也隨同前來，加入您麾下。

Text: 一個北軍兵團會加入您的勢力。
English: A regiment of the Northern Army will join your faction.
Mapped by text: 一個北軍兵團會加入您的勢力。

Text: 在此動蕩之秋，要想出人頭地就只有靠刀劍！贏得戰鬥便能展示您的能力。
English: The path to prominence in these turbulent times is by the sword! Win battles to demonstrate your capability.
Mapped by text: 在此動蕩之秋，要想出人頭地就只有靠刀劍！贏得戰鬥便能展示您的能力。

Text: 興師十萬，日费千金。國用不足則不能平亂。掌控舉國之財，而後昭示天下。
English: Wars are a costly endeavour and one cannot hope to end this chaos without a sizable treasury. Show all under heaven that you possess China's wealth.
Mapped by text: 興師十萬，日费千金。國用不足則不能平亂。掌控舉國之財，而後昭示天下。

Text: 要稱霸就要有正統的名義。若能建造一座萬人敬仰的皇城，便可彰顯實力，天下人必當歸順。
English: Cement your rule with legitimacy! Build an Imperial City that will be the envy of other warlords. All under heaven will look to you for leadership.
Mapped by text: 要稱霸就要有正統的名義。若能建造一座萬人敬仰的皇城，便可彰顯實力，天下人必當歸順。

Text: 所有的經濟活動都因爲新幣的鑄造而受到阻礙。我們別無選擇，只能等待商人們適應新的標準。
English: All economic activities have been hampered by the minting of a new coin. We have no choice but to wait for merchants to adjust to the new standard.
Mapped by text: 所有的經濟活動都因爲新幣的鑄造而受到阻礙。我們別無選擇，只能等待商人們適應新的標準。

Text: 由於新幣發行，買糧時出現問題。我們別無選擇，只能等到農民們適應新的標準。
English: We've run into problems purchasing grain with the new coin. We have no choice but to wait for farmers to adjust to the new standard.
Mapped by text: 由於新幣發行，買糧時出現問題。我們別無選擇，只能等到農民們適應新的標準。

Text: 由於新幣發行，分發軍餉時出現問題。我們別無選擇，只能等到士兵們適應新的標準。
English: We've run into problems paying the troops with the new coin. We have no choice but to wait for soldiers to adjust to the new standard.
Mapped by text: 由於新幣發行，分發軍餉時出現問題。我們別無選擇，只能等到士兵們適應新的標準。

Text: 完成這些任務，北軍校尉就會爲您效力。
English: Completing these missions will gather northern colonels to your cause.
Mapped by text: 完成這些任務，北軍校尉就會爲您效力。

Text: 天下大亂，雄豪並起。主公若能運籌演謀，鞭撻宇內，忠於漢室之能人必來投效。以公之神武明哲而輔以大順，何向而不濟！
English: None of the other warlords in China are as noble or accomplished as you are. Bring order to chaos and officers who were once loyal to the Han Dynasty will flock to your banner. Defeat your rivals and accumulate wealth to expand your power.
Override by key: 天下大亂，雄豪並起。主公若能運籌演謀，鞭撻宇內，忠於漢室之能人必來投效。以公之神武明哲而輔以大順，何向而不濟！

Text: 完成任務可以增强您的勢力！
English: Complete missions to bolster your faction!
Mapped by text: 完成任務可以增强您的勢力！

English: Lu Bu's army follows your faction.
Yuan Shu's army follows your faction.

Text: 使人民能夠安居樂業與死得其所，無所紛爭，是為王道政治的第一步。
English: Enabling the people to nourish their living and mourn their dead, without any feeling against any, is the first step of the rule of virtue.
Exact: 使人民能夠安居樂業與死得其所，無所紛爭，是為王道政治的第一步。

Text: ...分解帝國，以封地的形式分給各地諸侯，他被譽為強大的征服者...
English: ...dividing up the empire, parcelling it out in fiefs to the various kings and marquises, he was hailed as the mighty conqueror...
Exact: ...分解帝國，以封地的形式分給各地諸侯，他被譽為強大的征服者...

Text: 沒人願意追隨一個無能皇帝，你可知否？
English: No one will follow a useless emperor. You know that, don't you?
Mapped by text: 沒人願意追隨一個無能皇帝，你可知否？

Text: 與所有勢力的外交關係 [[b]]%+n[[/b]]
Mapped by text: 與所有勢力的外交關係 [[b]]%+n[[/b]]
Exact: 與所有勢力的外交關係[[b]]%+n[[/b]]

English: [[b]]%+n%[[/b]] income from looting settlements and post-battle loot
A New Era, A New Ruler.

Text: 經過數個世代，漢王朝失其天命。然而，天下黎民仍飽受各地宣稱帶有天命的軍閥，所帶來的戰亂之苦。主公，您必須終結亂世。天下正等待新的治理規則引導新的團結繁榮與太平盛世。您將如何選擇，治裡天下眾生？
English: After centuries, the old Han Dynasty has finally lost the Mandate of Heaven. Yet the people under heaven still suffer from the chaos of war brought by petty warlords and their false claims to the Mandate. My Lord, you must end this. China awaits a ruler who will bring unity and prosperity to the realm. How will you choose to rule the people of China?
Exact: 經過數個世代，漢王朝失其天命。然而，天下黎民仍飽受各地宣稱帶有天命的軍閥，所帶來的戰亂之苦。主公，您必須終結亂世。天下正等待新的治理規則引導新的團結繁榮與太平盛世。您將如何選擇，治裡天下眾生？

Text: 天下將以王道主義來治理。
English: China will be ruled by virtue
Exact: 天下將以王道主義來治理。

Text: 天下將以霸道主義來治理。
English: China will be ruled by might
Exact: 天下將以霸道主義來治理。

Text: 您是唯一能讓天下回歸太平之人。眾人將服從您的意志。
English: You are the only one who can bring lasting peace to China. Everyone must obey your will.
Exact: 您是唯一能讓天下回歸太平之人。眾人將服從您的意志。

Text: 您是唯一能讓天下回歸太平之人。眾人將服從您的意志。
English: You are the only one who can bring lasting peace to China. Everyone must obey your will.
Exact: 您是唯一能讓天下回歸太平之人。眾人將服從您的意志。

Text: [[b]]劉氏[[/b]]\\n躬親主母\\n\\n將領類別：{{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]劉夫人無時不在擔心她家人。也許她有些擔心過頭了。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Lady Liu[[/b]]\\nDevoted Mother\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Lady Liu constantly worries about her family. Perhaps she worries too much.[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]董旻[[/b]]\\n無魘暴君\\n\\n將領類型：{{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]貪暴成性，荼毒關中。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Dong Min[[/b]]\\nGreedy Tyrant\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Dong Min understands the unwritten rules of politics - one can never possess too much power.[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]董氏[[/b]]\\n郿侯夫人\\n\\n將領類型：{{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]董卓髮妻，卓封郿侯。不僅生性貪婪，且行事作風十分謹慎狡猾。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Dong Peishan[[/b]]\\nEmpress Dong\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Dong Peishan is greedy, but ever cautious in her conduct. If it’s Dong Zhou you’re after, you must outwit the cunning Dong Peishan first"[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]吳氏[[/b]]\\n武烈皇后\\n\\n將領類：{{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]氣質高雅，心胸寬廣。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Lady Wu[[/b]]\\nEmpress Wulie\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]No matter how brave the warrior, they cannot hope to match the power of her dignity and generosity.[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]閻象[[/b]]\\n賢達哲士\\n\\n將領類型：{{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]閻象深圖遠慮，總是危機到來之前就做好了準備。[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]馬雲祿[[/b]]\\n敦煌公主\\n\\n將領類型：{{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]馬雲祿深知兵在精而不在多，為了部隊執銳披堅她總是不惜血本。[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]呂姬[[/b]]\\n飛將之女\\n\\n將領類型：{{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]虎父無犬女，呂布之女不僅美豔，也是戰場豪傑。[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]養馬[[/b]]是此勢力的獨特資源。\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]]養育大宛馬來裝備騎兵部隊。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Horse Breeding[[/b]] is this faction's unique resource.\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]] Ferghana horses are bred to equip cavalry forces. [[/col]][[/i]]
Exact: [[b]]養馬[[/b]]是此勢力的獨特資源。\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]]養育大宛馬來裝備騎兵部隊。[[/col]][[/i]]

English: The finer your horses, the more powerful your cavalry will be.

Text: 採取[[b]]紮營[[/b]]姿態的軍隊可以建造更長期的營地。\\n\\n建立更大的城鎮需要耗費[[b]]糧食[[/b]]。
English: [[b]]Encamp[[/b]] is a stance for armies that allow them to set up a more permanent camp.\\n\\n[[b]]Food[[/b]] is used to establish bigger settlements.
Vanilla: 採取[[b]]紮營[[/b]]姿態的軍隊可以建造更長期的營地。\\n\\n建立更大的城鎮需要耗費[[b]]糧食[[/b]]。

Text: [[b]]軍事物資補給[[/b]]讓軍隊得以維持作戰能力，且會對[[b]]補員[[/b]]和[[b]]士氣[[/b]]造成影響。
English: [[b]]Military supplies[[/b]] allow an army to stay in fighting condition and will have an impact on [[b]]replenishment[[/b]] and [[b]]morale[[/b]].
Vanilla: [[b]]軍事物資補給[[/b]]讓軍隊得以維持作戰能力，且會對[[b]]補員[[/b]]和[[b]]士氣[[/b]]造成影響。

Text: [[b]]黑山[[/b]]是此勢力的獨特資源。\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]]黑山贼乘乱以增其之数。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Black Mountain[[/b]] is this faction's unique resource.\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]] Black Mountain bandits exploit the chaos to bolster their numbers. [[/col]][[/i]]
Exact: [[b]]黑山[[/b]]是此勢力的獨特資源。\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]]黑山贼乘乱以增其之数。[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: 黑山匪徒之數與日俱增，其行為亦更加肆無忌憚。
English: As the Black Mountain bandits increase in number, the more brazen they become.
Mapped by text: 黑山匪徒之數與日俱增，其行為亦更加肆無忌憚。

Text: [[b]]黃巾軍[[/b]]勢力被官府視為亂賊，因此一般來說和他們進行外交談判會受到[[b]]重重限制[[/b]]。張燕可以[[b]]增進與黃巾軍的關係[[/b]]，並與他們密切合作。
English: [[b]]Yellow Turban[[/b]] factions are seen as outlaws and diplomacy with them is normally [[b]]restricted[[/b]]. Zhang Yan can [[b]]improve relations[[/b]] with Yellow Turbans and can align himself with them.
Vanilla: [[b]]黃巾軍[[/b]]勢力被官府視為亂賊，因此一般來說和他們進行外交談判會受到[[b]]重重限制[[/b]]。張燕可以[[b]]增進與黃巾軍的關係[[/b]]，並與他們密切合作。

Text: 在[[b]]伏擊戰[[/b]]中，縱列行軍的守方兩翼大開，攻方得以任意選擇出擊的最佳時機。
English: In an [[b]]ambush[[/b]], the defending force is attacked from both sides while marching in column, leaving the attacker to choose the best time to strike.
Vanilla: 在[[b]]伏擊戰[[/b]]中，縱列行軍的守方兩翼大開，攻方得以任意選擇出擊的最佳時機。

Text: [[b]]傭兵哨站[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]附加建築[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]可以僱用傭兵[[/col]]\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] 商貿收入\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] 補員速率\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]對於沒有顯赫出身的人而言，財富最大的用處就是獲取權力，好讓出身平凡的有志之士亦能為國效力。[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]校尉部曲[[/b]]\\n\\n袁紹能夠不採用英雄人物，而是以低階軍官與校尉領軍，他們會帶領一群由各種單位組成的部曲。\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]校尉是以與兵卒平等的地位在前方領軍，他們會毫不猶豫地聽從您的命令。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Captain Retinues[[/b]]\\n\\nInstead of heroic characters, House of Yuan can employ lower-ranked officers and captains who lead retinues of various unit compositions.\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Leading their men as first amongst equals, captains will follow your orders without hesitation.[[/col]][[/i]]
Exact: [[b]]校尉部曲[[/b]]\\n\\n袁紹能夠不採用英雄人物，而是以低階軍官與校尉領軍，他們會帶領一群由各種單位組成的部曲。\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]校尉是以與兵卒平等的地位在前方領軍，他們會毫不猶豫地聽從您的命令。[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: 獲得軍事增益，但也會惡化與其他勢力的關係。
English: Gain military benefits at the expense of the relations with other factions.
Mapped by text: 獲得軍事增益，但也會惡化與其他勢力的關係。

Text: [[b]]宮廷[[/b]]乃是由位居官府要位的人物組成，他們對於您的勢力有深遠的影響。
English: The [[b]]court[[/b]] consists of characters in special government posts that have important effects on your faction.
Vanilla: [[b]]宮廷[[/b]]乃是由位居官府要位的人物組成，他們對於您的勢力有深遠的影響。

Text: [[b]]行政官員[[/b]]是您官府體制中的一個職位。行政官員負責監督一郡的地方官府，同時為其領土提供特定的加成。
English: [[b]]Administrator[[/b]] is a position within your government. An administrator oversees the local government in a commandery and provides certain bonuses to these lands.
Vanilla: [[b]]行政官員[[/b]]是您官府體制中的一個職位。行政官員負責監督一郡的地方官府，同時為其領土提供特定的加成。

Text: [[b]]駐防軍隊[[/b]]是駐紮在城鎮中的軍隊，城鎮遭遇攻擊時，他們會與當地駐軍一同作戰。
English: [[b]]Garrisoned armies[[/b]] are armies stationed in a settlement. These will be defending the city in case of an attack and join the local garrison.
Vanilla: [[b]]駐防軍隊[[/b]]是駐紮在城鎮中的軍隊，城鎮遭遇攻擊時，他們會與當地駐軍一同作戰。

Text: • 駐軍提供建築和收入加成
English: • Garrisoned armies provide construction bonus and income bonus
Mapped by text: • 駐軍提供建築和收入加成

Text: 嚴白虎可通過盜賊人脈招募普通 [[b]]漢軍單位[[/b]]。

Text: [[b]]堅韌度[[/b]]是此勢力的獨特資源。\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]]劉寵英勇克己，麾下兵士俱受其感召，與皇室為敵者則心懷恐懼。[[/col]][[/i]] \\n\\n
English: [[b]]Fortitude[[/b]] is this faction's unique resource.\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]] With bravery and discipline, Liu Chong inspires his men and puts fear into the enemies of the imperial palace. [[/col]][[/i]] \\n\\n
Exact: [[b]]堅韌度[[/b]]是此勢力的獨特資源。\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]]劉寵英勇克己，麾下兵士俱受其感召，與皇室為敵者則心懷恐懼。[[/col]][[/i]] \\n\\n

Text: 可透過[[b]]戰鬥勝利[[/b]]，以及對[[b]]敵軍[[/b]]造成比我軍更嚴重的[[b]]傷亡[[/b]]，來提升[[b]]堅韌度[[/b]]。
English: Increase your [[b]]fortitude[[/b]] through [[b]]winning battles[[/b]], and by inflicting greater [[b]]casualties[[/b]] upon [[b]]enemy forces[[/b]] than they inflict upon yours.
Vanilla: 可透過[[b]]戰鬥勝利[[/b]]，以及對[[b]]敵軍[[/b]]造成比我軍更嚴重的[[b]]傷亡[[/b]]，來提升[[b]]堅韌度[[/b]]。

Text: 這些[[b]]戰利品[[/b]]或來自敵軍屍首、或因功獲賞而得，兩者都是此勢力[[b]]積極作戰[[/b]]的回報。
English: Whether from the bodies of fallen enemies, or awarded for gallant behaviour, these [[b]]trophies[[/b]] reward an [[b]]aggressive approach[[/b]] to this faction.
Vanilla: 這些[[b]]戰利品[[/b]]或來自敵軍屍首、或因功獲賞而得，兩者都是此勢力[[b]]積極作戰[[/b]]的回報。

Text: [[b]]戰利品[[/b]]可以陳放於[[b]]戰利品櫃[[/b]]內。每一個陳放的[[b]]戰利品[[/b]]都會提供加成效果。
English: [[b]]Trophies[[/b]] can be displayed in the [[b]]trophy cabinet[[/b]]. Each [[b]]trophy[[/b]] provides a bonus whilst it is on display.
Vanilla: [[b]]戰利品[[/b]]可以陳放於[[b]]戰利品櫃[[/b]]內。每一個陳放的[[b]]戰利品[[/b]]都會提供加成效果。

Text: 敵軍許多士兵會欣然加入我軍，拒絕者則當斬首示眾。此舉能補充我軍兵力，然而可能影響與敵方勢力的關係。

Mapped by text: 此將有如一堵難以撼動的牆，激勵麾下兵士堅守陣線排除萬難。

Text: 此英雄向敵將大膽喊話，令對方心神動搖。
English: This hero accosts the enemy hero, shaking them to the core.
Mapped by text: 此英雄向敵將大膽喊話，令對方心神動搖。

Text: 此人高呼一聲，策馬飛奔。他衝入敵陣的勁道之強，足以將大批士兵一舉震飛。

Text: 軍隊將跟隨你 ... 永遠的。
English: The Force will be with you... always.

Text: 隱匿行蹤，然後發動攻擊。
English: This unit can fire at the enemy whilst remaining hidden.
Exact: 隱匿行蹤，然後發動攻擊。

Text: 他們已達成自我修練的目標。
English: They push the limits of the human body.
Exact: 他們已達成自我修練的目標。

Text: 下一擊將更為精準且更有殺傷力。
English: With each volley their shots become ever more powerful and accurate.
Exact: 下一擊將更為精準且更有殺傷力。

Text: 他們將粉碎阻擋他們的一切；或一死。
English: They'll smash anything in their way. Or die.
Exact: 他們將粉碎阻擋他們的一切；或一死。

Text: 在腥風血雨中你仍有所依靠。
English: In the midst of a bloodbath, it's nice to know that someone has your back.
Mapped by text: 在腥風血雨中你仍有所依靠。
Exact: 在一次大屠殺中，很高興有人仍願意成為你的依靠。

Text: 希望之火在最黯時刻光芒閃耀。
English: The flame of hope shines bright in the darkest hour.
Mapped by text: 希望之火在最黯時刻光芒閃耀。
Exact: 是說，情況最差之時，最好把火燒至最旺。

Text: 當在戰場上與英雄對抗或決鬥時，他們會發現自己的技能與戰力得到相當程度的增強。
English: When fighting against or duelling other heroes on the battlefield, they will find their skill and prowess much improved.
Exact: 當在戰場上與英雄對抗或決鬥時，他們會發現自己的技能與戰力得到相當程度的增強。

Text: 榮耀鄉里，他們永不言退。
English: They will fight hard to uphold the honour of their homeland.
Exact: 榮耀鄉里，他們永不言退。

Text: 保護馬匹免於投射兵器的攻擊。
English: Armour protects precious warhorses from enemy projectiles.
Exact: 保護馬匹免於投射兵器的攻擊。

Text: 保護馬匹免於投射兵器的攻擊。
English: Armour protects precious warhorses from enemy projectiles.
Exact: 保護馬匹免於投射兵器的攻擊。

Text: 定位，準備抵禦飛矢攻擊。
English: This unit maneuvers carefully to guard against missile attacks.
Exact: 定位，準備抵禦飛矢攻擊。

Text: 軍團的成員皆長年共處的夥伴，對彼此充滿了信念。
English: Years of fighting have solidified the faith these soldiers have in each other.
Mapped by text: 軍團的成員皆長年共處的夥伴，對彼此充滿了信念。
Exact: 劉備的軍團的成員皆長年共處的夥伴，對彼此充滿了信念。

Text: 黑山盜匪們有非常特別的情誼連結。當他們與同夥聚在一起時，勇氣倍增。
English: The Black Mountain bandits share a special bond. Together, their boldness knows no bounds.
Exact: 黑山盜匪們有非常特別的情誼連結。當他們與同夥聚在一起時，勇氣倍增。

Text: 泰山匪徒發現某些植物燃燒時所冒的煙霧對人體有害。
English: The bandits of Taishan discovered how to create thick, rolling smoke by burning certain plants. It's also toxic.
Exact: 泰山匪徒發現某些植物燃燒時所冒的煙霧對人體有害。

English: Tiger furs provide protection against missile attacks.
Eng-short: 此人精神如猛虎，在沒有偉大的勇氣支持下無人膽敢面對此人。

Text: 對戰鬥之慾求超越體能之限。
English: Their thirst for battle goes beyond physical limits.
Exact: 對戰鬥之慾求超越體能之限。

English: Their energy is like a dragon.

Text: 當面臨戰鬥時，他們將越戰越勇。
English: Bring the fight to them and they will hold their ground.
Exact: 當面臨戰鬥時，他們將越戰越勇。
箭如雨下之時，在此猛擊前他們堅若磐石。

English: Bring the fight to them and they will hold their ground.
Speed is the essence of war.

Text: 他們知道如何保持體力。
English: These warriors know how to control fatigue.
Exact: 他們知道如何保持體力。
他們擁有出色的馭馬突擊技巧。

Text: 「你也許不勇敢，但只要大家在一起就勇氣倍增。」
Exact: 「你也許不勇敢，但只要大家在一起就勇氣倍增。」

Text: 僱傭軍指揮官知道如何驅趕敵人。
English: They knows how to drive their enemies off the battlefield.
Exact: 僱傭軍指揮官知道如何驅趕敵人。

Text: 阻擊騎手，拉下他，處死他，毫不留情地。
English: Stop the horse, pull the rider down, and kill without mercy.
Exact: 阻擊騎手，拉下他，處死他，毫不留情地。

Text: 一首古老的歌謠，提醒人們上天會庇佑有德之人。
English: An ancient chant that serves as a reminder that Heaven is with the virtuous.
Vanilla: 一首古老的歌謠，提醒人們上天會庇佑有德之人。

Text: 他們聞到血腥就會瘋狂。
English: They becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.
Mapped by text: 他們聞到血腥就會瘋狂。

Text: 單位呈分散的陣形，使其較不容易被弓箭擊中。
English: The unit spreads apart, making it more difficult for arrows to hit them.
Vanilla: 單位呈分散的陣形，使其較不容易被弓箭擊中。

Text: 單位面對敵人組成一道盾牆，是面對弓箭攻擊時往前推進的最佳進攻陣形。不過無法在近戰中維持此陣形。
English: The unit presents a wall of shields to the enemy - an offensive formation best used to push forward under arrow fire. However the formation cannot be maintained in melee combat.
Vanilla: 單位面對敵人組成一道盾牆，是面對弓箭攻擊時往前推進的最佳進攻陣形。不過無法在近戰中維持此陣形。

Text: 面對逆境，所剩兵士只能集結起來坚定决心。
English: In the face of adversity, those left standing will close ranks and bolster their resolve.
Mapped by text: 面對逆境，所剩兵士只能集結起來坚定决心。

Text: 解決掉他們的弓手，我們到中間會合。
English: Take out their archers. I'll meet you in the middle.
Mapped by text: 解決掉他們的弓手，我們到中間會合。

Text: 此單位激勵附近士卒更粗莽地戰鬥。

Mapped by text: 此單位激勵附近士卒更粗莽地戰鬥。

Text: 冲啊！ 冲啊！ 为了捍卫天下！勇往直前！
English: Ride, ride to ruin and the world's ending!
Mapped by text: 冲啊！ 冲啊！ 为了捍卫天下！勇往直前！

English: The Black Mountain bandits unleash their fury.
The Black Mountain bandits make their stand.
The Black Mountain bandits make their advance.
The Black Mountain bandits make their move.

Text: 士氣高昂時，他們渴望擊敗敵人。
English: Some care not for their own personal safety and so work themselves into a whirlwind of destruction and mindless violence!
Exact: 士氣高昂時，他們渴望擊敗敵人。

Text: 我别无选择，只能假装自己是一個無畏战士

Text: 就只是普通的果殼，但踩到可是會劇痛不已，使士兵不良於行。
English: Simple nut husks, once trodden upon, cause extreme pain and slow movement.
Vanilla: 就只是普通的果殼，但踩到可是會劇痛不已，使士兵不良於行。

Text: 以濃煙阻擋視線，暫時隱蔽單位行蹤。
English: Thick plumes of smoke obscure line of sight, making units seem temporarily invisible.
Vanilla: 以濃煙阻擋視線，暫時隱蔽單位行蹤。

Text: 他們是受過武術訓練的優秀戰士。

Pike Wall - Ji Guards of the Eight Talents

English: The unit presents a wall of spear-points to the enemy - a strong formation that allows the unit to advance slowly but safely whilst defending against charges.

Text: 驅逐這些人是非常困難的。
Exact: 驅逐這些人是非常困難的。

Text: 單位組成中空的方陣，將長矛與長槍指向四面來襲的敵人，特別是來襲的騎兵。
English: The unit forms into a hollow square, presenting spears and pikes to any attacker - particularly cavalry - on all four sides.
Vanilla: 單位組成中空的方陣，將長矛與長槍指向四面來襲的敵人，特別是來襲的騎兵。

Text: 單位呈分散的陣形，使其較不容易被弓箭擊中。
English: The unit spreads apart, making it more difficult for arrows to hit them.
Vanilla: 單位呈分散的陣形，使其較不容易被弓箭擊中。

Text: 像戟這樣的長柄武器可以阻擋對方的攻擊。
English: Certain polearms, such as the Ji, can parry incoming attacks.
Mapped by text: 像戟這樣的長柄武器可以阻擋對方的攻擊。

Text: 特殊的松香黏著於敵人的鎧甲上。
English: Flammable rosin sticks to clothing and armour.
Exact: 特殊的松香黏著於敵人的鎧甲上。

English: Specially made crossbow bolts from Chen.

Text: 火藥的轟鳴聲比任何人獸都更可畏。
English: The roar of gunpowder is more terrifying than any man or beast.
Mapped by text: 火藥的轟鳴聲比任何人獸都更可畏。

Text: 強大的毒素將散佈全身導致癱瘓。
English: Powerful toxins spread and paralyze the body.
Exact: 強大的毒素將散佈全身導致癱瘓。

Text: 白馬義從贈與敵人的威脅射擊。
English: Shots from the White Horse Fellows give their enemies pause.
Exact: 白馬義從贈與敵人的威脅射擊。

Text: 壓倒性的優勢之於敵方，令其動彈不得。
English: This unit has been overwhelmed by the enemy and cannot move properly.
Exact: 壓倒性的優勢之於敵方，令其動彈不得。

Text: 戰斧擁有削弱盾牌效果的獨特能力，不論勾扯或劈砍都管用。
English: Whether through hooking, or hacking, axes have a unique ability to reduce the effectiveness of shields.
Vanilla: 戰斧擁有削弱盾牌效果的獨特能力，不論勾扯或劈砍都管用。
Exact: 無論是橫勾或直劈，斧頭皆具特有的手法降低盾所擁有的防護力。

Text: 黃巾軍志士個個不怕衝鋒陷陣，但是護民勇士尤其適合固守陣線，要是挪作他用可就浪費了他們一身的本領和熱忱。\\n\\n他們身披重甲，也許不若其他鐵甲兵士防禦周全，但可仰賴手中長槍盾牌抵擋敵軍、化解攻勢。正所謂甲冑可破，鬥志不渝。
English: Whilst all Yellow Turban warriors are happy to wade into the heart of battle, the Gallants of the People were made to hold the frontline against enemies - to be anywhere else would be to waste their talent and ardour. \\n\\n They are heavily-armoured, though not as heavily plated as some other warriors, yet with great axe they are able to push back the advancing foe whilst deflecting blows. Where their mail may falter, their fanaticism never will.
Vanilla: 黃巾軍志士個個不怕衝鋒陷陣，但是護民勇士尤其適合固守陣線，要是挪作他用可就浪費了他們一身的本領和熱忱。\\n\\n他們身披重甲，也許不若其他鐵甲兵士防禦周全，但可仰賴手中長槍盾牌抵擋敵軍、化解攻勢。正所謂甲冑可破，鬥志不渝。

Text: 勇氣是最好的將領，能帶領士兵踏上沙場。良斧在手，則能讓士兵在沙場存活。
English: Bravery drives a warrior to battle more effectively than any general; a great axe keeps them there.
Mapped by text: 勇氣是最好的將領，能帶領士兵踏上沙場。良斧在手，則能讓士兵在沙場存活。

Text: 這群憂國憂民之士自稱正道使者，用自身錢財購買護甲與兵器。每人都進行過各種訓練，能熟練使用長戟，並透過傳統的弓箭比試來學習箭術。 \\n\\n 他們雖身穿昂貴服飾，志向卻絕非虛榮賣弄。他們的箭術與戟法皆不容忽視，這樣的靈活多變對戰事有極大助益，也因此受到黃巾軍的熱烈歡迎，一同為太平而戰。
English: These concerned citizens call themselves the Bringers of Righteousness and have used their wealth to purchase their own armour and weapons. Each has undertaken extensive training to become proficient using polearms and learned how to use a bow through traditional archery competitions. \\n\\n Though they wear expensive tunics, their commitment is not mere vainglory; their not-inconsiderable skill with the bow and polearm make them extremely useful due to their flexibility, and therefore welcomed to join the fight for the Great Peace.
Vanilla: 這群憂國憂民之士自稱正道使者，用自身錢財購買護甲與兵器。每人都進行過各種訓練，能熟練使用長戟，並透過傳統的弓箭比試來學習箭術。 \\n\\n 他們雖身穿昂貴服飾，志向卻絕非虛榮賣弄。他們的箭術與戟法皆不容忽視，這樣的靈活多變對戰事有極大助益，也因此受到黃巾軍的熱烈歡迎，一同為太平而戰。

Text: 技藝高超的步兵，配有長兵器和弓。戰鬥技巧多變且頗具威力，遠程與近戰皆宜。
English: Skilled militia armed with polearms and bows, a flexible and effective unit for combat both close and from afar.
Vanilla: 技藝高超的步兵，配有長兵器和弓。戰鬥技巧多變且頗具威力，遠程與近戰皆宜。

Text: 漢軍民兵是被迫服役效勞朝廷，黃巾信眾則是為了扶助天下萬民而挺身奮戰。\\n\\n他們堅守職志，比起一般民兵更加善戰。這些信眾執大刀著輕甲趕赴沙場，欲將質疑太平道的敵人全數斬除。
English: Where the militia of the Han are pressed into service out of obligation, the Yellow Turban zealots rise to fight because it is the only way to carve a better future for the people. \\n\\n Their fierce determination makes them more effective than standard militia. They charge into battle, lightly-armoured and equipped with explosive materials, ready to rend asunder any who doubt or question the Way.
Vanilla: 漢軍民兵是被迫服役效勞朝廷，黃巾信眾則是為了扶助天下萬民而挺身奮戰。\\n\\n他們堅守職志，比起一般民兵更加善戰。這些信眾執大刀著輕甲趕赴沙場，欲將質疑太平道的敵人全數斬除。

Text: 不顧己命也要阻擋敵人。
English: Their own lives are not important, and they will somehow stop the enemy.
Mapped by text: 不顧己命也要阻擋敵人。

Text: 這群士兵的作用能從外表窺知一二：他們的護甲並非成套，而是收集戰後遺留的部件或附近村莊之物拼湊而成。 \\n\\n 他們最大的用處便是在戰鬥結束後收集戰利品、武器和護甲，以便在成就太平之路上添磚加瓦。他們會帶著長槍和盾來自保，有時也可上陣充數，但他們幾乎毫無武藝可言，而且容易潰逃。
English: The role of these troops can be deduced from their appearance; their armour pieces are mismatched, put together by collecting those left in the aftermath of battle, or sourced from nearby villages. \\n\\n Their most important function is to search and collect loot, weapons and armour after the battle to put towards the Great Peace. They are not good at close combat, so they use a bunch of captured repeating crossbows to support frontline.
Vanilla: 這群士兵的作用能從外表窺知一二：他們的護甲並非成套，而是收集戰後遺留的部件或附近村莊之物拼湊而成。 \\n\\n 他們最大的用處便是在戰鬥結束後收集戰利品、武器和護甲，以便在成就太平之路上添磚加瓦。他們會帶著長槍和盾來自保，有時也可上陣充數，但他們幾乎毫無武藝可言，而且容易潰逃。

Text: 這支步兵負責收集在戰場上遺落的兵甲，協助同袍再戰。
English: This infantry gathers equipment dropped or left behind in battle to help their brothers and sisters continue the fight.
Vanilla: 這支步兵負責收集在戰場上遺落的兵甲，協助同袍再戰。

Text: 替天行道，衝鋒陷陣，為民除害，是彼使命。\\n\\n儘管以突擊騎兵而言這支先鋒部隊的戰力不算上乘，但他們以韌性見長，一旦執槍闖入敵陣，便能憑著良甲和武藝持續奮戰，哪怕是頑石般的盔甲也難以抵擋他們灌注義憤的一擊。
English: To be the bolt of justice, to spearhead a charge deep into the enemy lines, delivering vengeance for an oppressed people, this is the task of these warriors. \\n\\n These cavalry are one of the few shock cavalry of the Yellow Turbans army.; once they have ploughed into an enemy formation with their spears, they have the armour and the skill to keep fighting, thrusting with enough force to pierce most armour with righteous intensity.
Vanilla: 替天行道，衝鋒陷陣，為民除害，是彼使命。\\n\\n儘管以突擊騎兵而言這支先鋒部隊的戰力不算上乘，但他們以韌性見長，一旦執槍闖入敵陣，便能憑著良甲和武藝持續奮戰，哪怕是頑石般的盔甲也難以抵擋他們灌注義憤的一擊。

Text: 他們手執長槍一馬當先，發出正義戰吼直搗敵軍！
English: At the head of charge they draw their spears, driving home with a righteous cry!
Vanilla: 他們手執長槍一馬當先，發出正義戰吼直搗敵軍！

Text: 在道家的中心思想裡，敬重土地、滋養土地，則土地必將恩澤人民。承蒙天地滋養的勇士，有責任運用這份恩賜懲奸除惡，平定四方。\\n\\n這些戰士拾柴造箭、削木做弓，箭法遠超常人。
English: It is a central tenet of Taoism that the land must be revered and nurtured; it, in turn, will return to us its bounties. Those chosen warriors who receive of nature's boons must use its gifts to pursue those who have contributed to the corruption and destruction plaguing the land. \\n\\n From the boughs of the trees, arrows and crossbows are fashioned and handled by warriors who wield them with greater expertise than most of their contemporaries.
Vanilla: 在道家的中心思想裡，敬重土地、滋養土地，則土地必將恩澤人民。承蒙天地滋養的勇士，有責任運用這份恩賜懲奸除惡，平定四方。\\n\\n這些戰士拾柴造箭、削木做弓，箭法遠超常人。

Text: 護育水土、救亡天下，此乃地傑軍之夙願。
English: Nature must be preserved and the world saved. These warriors will see it done.
Vanilla: 護育水土、救亡天下，此乃地傑軍之夙願。

Text: 黃巾軍起義，劍指危害天下的腐敗，並讓許多人對心中舊有的忠誠觀念產生疑問。 \\n\\n 這些名門賢士拋棄了原先效忠的諸侯，轉而尋求公義，彌補自己的罪過。他們因先前的優渥生活而受過紮實的訓練，並擁有精良的裝備。賢士穿戴華美的護甲與頭盔，騎著威風凜凜的良駒駿馬踏上戰場。 \\n\\n 他們手持斧頭、舉起盾牌向前衝鋒，只為突破陣線，與敵軍來場你死我活的近戰廝殺。
English: The Yellow Turban rebellion challenges the corruption that poisons China and has made many question old loyalties. \\n\\n These noblemen have renounced their former warlords to seek justice and redemption. Their previous life of privilege has trained and equipped them well, and they ride into battle clad in ornate armour and helmets upon impressive mounts of the finest stock. \\n\\n With sharp spears, the impact of their charge is merely a way to break the enemy’s lines for deadly close combat.
Vanilla: 黃巾軍起義，劍指危害天下的腐敗，並讓許多人對心中舊有的忠誠觀念產生疑問。 \\n\\n 這些名門賢士拋棄了原先效忠的諸侯，轉而尋求公義，彌補自己的罪過。他們因先前的優渥生活而受過紮實的訓練，並擁有精良的裝備。賢士穿戴華美的護甲與頭盔，騎著威風凜凜的良駒駿馬踏上戰場。 \\n\\n 他們手持斧頭、舉起盾牌向前衝鋒，只為突破陣線，與敵軍來場你死我活的近戰廝殺。

Text: 精銳騎兵護衛，將兵器指向昔日主君，改為黃巾軍效力。
English: Elite cavalry guards who have turned their weapons against their former masters to serve the Yellow Turbans.
Vanilla: 精銳騎兵護衛，將兵器指向昔日主君，改為黃巾軍效力。

Text: 由校尉和衛官來指揮軍隊。
English: A captain and the guards commanding the army instead of the general.
Mapped by text: 由校尉和衛官來指揮軍隊。

Text: 重裝部隊，携帶張力很强的鐵弓。
English: Heavily-armoured troops carrying iron bows that requires very strong tension.
Mapped by text: 重裝部隊，携帶張力很强的鐵弓。

Text: 佩戴盾與手戟，這些西涼勇士為敵人帶來殺身之禍。
English: With Hand-ji and shield, these Xiliang warriors will bring death to the enemy.
Mapped by text: 佩戴盾與手戟，這些西涼勇士為敵人帶來殺身之禍。

Text: 沒有任何騎兵能衝破赫赫有名的西涼軍槍陣。
English: No horseman shall pass these spearmen from the famed Xiliang army.
Mapped by text: 沒有任何騎兵能衝破赫赫有名的西涼軍槍陣。

Text: 這些人熟練地揮舞著戰戟，他們會維護西涼軍可怕的聲譽。
English: Brandishing their Ji expertly, these men will uphold the fearsome reputation of the Xiliang army.
Mapped by text: 這些人熟練地揮舞著戰戟，他們會維護西涼軍可怕的聲譽。

Text: 他們的弩矢提醒敵人，即使離得很遠，在强大的西涼軍前也不會安全。
English: Their bolts remind the foe that even at range, noone is truly safe from the might of the Xiliang army.
Mapped by text: 他們的弩矢提醒敵人，即使離得很遠，在强大的西涼軍前也不會安全。

Text: 草原部落多年的戰鬥已將這些西涼騎兵塑造成了一支致命的力量。
English: Years of fighting the steppe tribes have shaped these Xiliang spear-riders into a deadly force.
Mapped by text: 草原部落多年的戰鬥已將這些西涼騎兵塑造成了一支致命的力量。

Text: 佩戴劍盾，這些西涼騎兵令敵軍不寒而慄。
English: With sword and shield, these Xiliang horsemen will strike fear into the foe.
Mapped by text: 佩戴劍盾，這些西涼騎兵令敵軍不寒而慄。

Text: 這些馬弓手與其他遊牧部落征戰多年，在任何戰場上都是西涼軍的驕傲。
English: Echoing the nomads they fought for years, these horse archers will do the Xiliang army proud on any battlefield.
Mapped by text: 這些馬弓手與其他遊牧部落征戰多年，在任何戰場上都是西涼軍的驕傲。

Text: 就算在精銳的西涼軍裏，一把大刀對於將領來説也頗有好處。
English: Even in the elite Xiliang army, having a big sword can only bring advantages to a commander.
Mapped by text: 就算在精銳的西涼軍裏，一把大刀對於將領來説也頗有好處。

Text: 這些精銳矛兵是百經錘煉的西涼戰士，會堅守陣地對抗所有來敵。
English: Hardened Xiliang soldies, these elite spearmen will hold the line against all comers.
Mapped by text: 這些精銳矛兵是百經錘煉的西涼戰士，會堅守陣地對抗所有來敵。

Text: 佩戴劍弓，這些硬朗的士兵執行他們主公的意志。
English: Armed with bow and sword, these hardy soldiers enforce the will of their warlord.
Mapped by text: 佩戴劍弓，這些硬朗的士兵執行他們主公的意志。

Text: 佩戴劍弓，這些紀律嚴明的騎手執行他們主公的意志。
English: Armed with bow and sword, these disciplined riders enforce the will of their warlord.
Mapped by text: 佩戴劍弓，這些紀律嚴明的騎手執行他們主公的意志。

Text: 作爲西涼軍的驕傲，這些重甲騎兵將教導他們的敵人“精銳騎兵”的含義。
English: The pride of the Xiliang army, these armored horsemen will teach their enemy the meaning of “elite cavalry”.
Mapped by text: 作爲西涼軍的驕傲，這些重甲騎兵將教導他們的敵人“精銳騎兵”的含義。

Text: 即使在沙塵中，他們也總能準確命中。
English: Their shots are almost always accurate even in the sand breeze.
Mapped by text: 即使在沙塵中，他們也總能準確命中。

Text: 在荊楚的山中，粗心的人可能會被一把蒺藜絆倒，然後被放它的人殺死。
English: Amongst the hills of Jingchu, the unwary may find themselves tripped upon a caltrop, and slain by the man who laid it.
Mapped by text: 在荊楚的山中，粗心的人可能會被一把蒺藜絆倒，然後被放它的人殺死。

Text: 這些人所揮的大斧是楚國的榮耀，即使是持盾的敵人亦命不久矣。
English: Echoing the glory of Chu, the great axes these men wield will make short work of their shielded foes.
Mapped by text: 這些人所揮的大斧是楚國的榮耀，即使是持盾的敵人亦命不久矣。

Text: 這些楚國的矛兵與山丘一樣堅韌，對任何一個軍閥來說都是一筆財富。
English: Stalwart as the hills they were raised in, these Chu spearmen are an asset to any warlord.
Mapped by text: 這些楚國的矛兵與山丘一樣堅韌，對任何一個軍閥來說都是一筆財富。

Text: 荊楚弓手早已領悟到了弓箭在丘陵地帶的優勢。
English: Raining death from afar, the archers of Jingchu have learned well the advantage that the bow brings in hilly terrain.
Mapped by text: 荊楚弓手早已領悟到了弓箭在丘陵地帶的優勢。

Text: 燕疆不乏良馬。連綿的戰事為這些戰馬提供了老練的騎手。
English: The Yan frontier offers no shortage of good horses. The constant warfare provides these steeds with expert riders.
Mapped by text: 燕疆不乏良馬。連綿的戰事為這些戰馬提供了老練的騎手。

Text: 對任何一個士兵來説，一隊持槍騎兵的衝鋒都會令人生畏。但如果殺來的是燕國戰士，則是一種全新的恐怖。
English: A charge from a squadron of Spear cavalry is a daunting sight for any soldier. But to see the warriors of Yan descend upon them is a new brand of terror altogether.
Mapped by text: 對任何一個士兵來説，一隊持槍騎兵的衝鋒都會令人生畏。但如果殺來的是燕國戰士，則是一種全新的恐怖。

Text: 只要這些人有力量揮舞他們的戰戟，漢室的榮耀就將延續。
English: The Glory of the Han shall endure while these men have the strength to wield their halberds.
Mapped by text: 只要這些人有力量揮舞他們的戰戟，漢室的榮耀就將延續。

Text: 無論遠近，這些士卒都要為任何威脅他們主公的人討回公道。
English: Whether near or from afar, these soldiers shall bring justice to any who would threaten their prince.
Mapped by text: 無論遠近，這些士卒都要為任何威脅他們主公的人討回公道。

Text: A prince's retinue reflects their glory in splendour. These brave cavalrymen match their splendour with equal prowress in battle.
English: A prince's retinue reflects their glory in splendour. These brave cavalrymen match their splendour with equal prowress in battle.

Text: 這些多能的步兵幾乎可以解决吳軍將領可能面臨的任何問題。
English: These versatile infantry will solve nigh any problem their Wu commanders might face.
Mapped by text: 這些多能的步兵幾乎可以解决吳軍將領可能面臨的任何問題。

Text: 當敵人在戰場上看到藍色頭巾時，他們就知道最艱苦的戰鬥即將開始。
English: As the enemy spots the blue turbans on the field, they know the hardest fighting is about to begin.
Mapped by text: 當敵人在戰場上看到藍色頭巾時，他們就知道最艱苦的戰鬥即將開始。

Text: 顯赫的血統可以使許多劍士願意效命。
English: An illustrious lineage provides many swords, along with men willing to wield them.
Mapped by text: 顯赫的血統可以使許多劍士願意效命。

Text: 長久保衛家園之後，即使是民兵也可能成長為職業士兵的對手。
English: Having defended their home for long enough, even militia may grow to rival professional soldiers.
Mapped by text: 長久保衛家園之後，即使是民兵也可能成長為職業士兵的對手。

Text: 漢室必須復興。這些人將誓死跟隨他們通曉大義的將軍。
English: The Han must be restored. These men shall follow their righteous general to the death to see it done.
Mapped by text: 漢室必須復興。這些人將誓死跟隨他們通曉大義的將軍。

Text: The desperate and the disenfranchised gather at the base of Black Mountain, ready to expand their fortunes or die trying.
English: The desperate and the disenfranchised gather at the base of Black Mountain, ready to expand their fortunes or die trying.

Text: With club in hand, the desperate shall make a fortune and name for themselves, or die trying.
English: With club in hand, the desperate shall make a fortune and name for themselves, or die trying.

Text: In the hills and mountains of the Southlands, the desperate will lay down their lives to escape the Han.
English: In the hills and mountains of the Southlands, the desperate will lay down their lives to escape the Han.

Text: Great danger hides in the early mist of day. Phantoms that will maim their prey, or whose choking gass leaves them gasping for air.
English: Great danger hides in the early mist of day. Phantoms that will maim their prey, or whose choking gass leaves them gasping for air.

Text: The sting of an arrowshaft can be deadly, but with these archers, death may still find you long after the arrow pierced your flesh.
English: The sting of an arrowshaft can be deadly, but with these archers, death may still find you long after the arrow pierced your flesh.

Text: 南方山間的陡峭山崖將百姓磨練成目光如電的戰士。
English: The cragged edges of the southern mountains fashion peasants into warriors, flint-eyed and sharp.
Vanilla: 南方山間的陡峭山崖將百姓磨練成目光如電的戰士。

Text: 很多軍閥都想要有草原騎射手。但與其為人效命，有時候不如自己單幹。
English: Steppe horse archers are in high demand by many warlords. But sometimes they make a better profit by working for themselves.
Mapped by text: 很多軍閥都想要有草原騎射手。但與其為人效命，有時候不如自己單幹。

Text: 這些人并非軍士，卻穿著精良的鎧甲。他們的裝備來自於血腥的勝利和洗劫。
English: What kind of men are these, who are not soldiers, yet wear elite armour? Bloody men, who have earned their weaponry through victory and pillaging.
Mapped by text: 這些人并非軍士，卻穿著精良的鎧甲。他們的裝備來自於血腥的勝利和洗劫。

Text: 這些身經百戰的精銳盜賊兩手各持一斧，率先出陣，攻敵不備。
English: These elite, battle-hardened bandits carry an axe in each hand, and advance ahead of the front lines to catch their foes unawares
Vanilla: 這些身經百戰的精銳盜賊兩手各持一斧，率先出陣，攻敵不備。

Text: Ingenuity and craftsmanship can turn even a lowly militiaman into a daunting foe.
English: Ingenuity and craftsmanship can turn even a lowly militiaman into a daunting foe.

Text: 多少軍隊試圖擊潰這些戰士，成功者寥寥無幾。
English: To break these warriors is the challenge of many an army. So far, very few have succeeded.
Vanilla: 多少軍隊試圖擊潰這些戰士，成功者寥寥無幾。

Text: 劍兩側開鋒，刃身筆直，又名「百兵之君」，和棍、刀、槍並列為四大兵器。劍需要一年時間訓練才能在實戰中應用，因此只有武藝最精湛的劍士才會使用。 \\n\\n 精锐剑士的功用是堅守陣線，即便其他人都力竭倒下了，他們仍能憑藉著劍技、皮甲和圓盾繼續奮戰。
English: The jian is a straight, double-edged sword known as the 'Gentleman of Weapons', and considered to be one of the four major weapons alongside the gun, dao and qiang. It takes a year of training before one is considered competent enough to use it, and so only the most skilled swordsmen are equipped with it. \\n\\n The role of the Elite Swordsmen is to hold the line against enemy attacks, and their swordsmanship, heavy armour and gourd shields enable them to do this long after others have fallen to exhaustion.

Text: 沉重的鐵弓，對普通弓箭手來說不容易使用。\\n\n由於强大的張力和沉重的箭頭，射程很短，但箭頭會穿透敵人。\\n\n這隻部隊裝備有鐵甲，在近距離戰鬥中，可以輕易砍殺敵軍。
English: A heavy bow made of iron is not easy to use for ordinary archers. \\n\n The range is rather short due to the strong tension and heavy arrowheads, but the arrows will penetrate the enemy. \\n\n This unit is heavily armed with ironclad, and in close combat, it cuts enemy troops with direct distribution.

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老練的西涼軍是大多數軍閥羡慕的對象，也是西涼軍將領的驕傲。\\n\\n這些士兵會先投擲一隻備用的手戟，然後沖向敵人的防線，一隻手揮舞著他們的匕首斧，另一隻手拿著盾牌來招架敵人的回擊。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. After having thrown a spare hand-ji, these men will charge the enemy line, swinging their dagger-axes in one hand while the other holds a shield to parry retaliatory blows.
Override by key: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老練的西涼軍是大多數軍閥羡慕的對象，也是西涼軍將領的驕傲。\\n\\n這些士兵會先投擲一隻備用的手戟，然後沖向敵人的防線，一隻手揮舞著他們的匕首斧，另一隻手拿著盾牌來招架敵人的回擊。

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老練的西涼軍是大多數軍閥羡慕的對象，也是西涼軍將領的驕傲。\\n\\n這些矛兵通過先發制人的衝鋒來保護側翼，並以一定角度支起他們的羌族長矛，只有最愚蠢或最勇敢的騎兵才敢向其衝鋒。但這使他們成為遠程攻擊的目標，因此他們裝備了皮甲，並攜帶大型盾牌，以保護自己免受箭雨傷害。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n These spearmen protect the flanks by pre-empting charges and bracing their qiang spears at an angle, so only the most foolish or brave cavalry dare charge them. This makes them a target for missile attacks, so they are outfitted in leather armour and carry large shields to protect themselves from the expected rain of arrows.

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老練的西涼軍是大多數軍閥羡慕的對象，也是西涼軍將領的驕傲。\\n\\n這些士兵，裝備了長戟，將在騎兵衝鋒時嚴陣以待，讓馬自己衝到他們的刀刃上。他們身穿鐵甲，可以自如地加入混戰，迎擊所有來犯。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n These soldiers, armed with the long Ji, will brace and hold against cavalry charges, letting the horse impale itself on their blades. Wearing iron armour, they will wade into the melee confidently and take on all comers.

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老練的西涼軍是大多數軍閥羡慕的對象，也是西涼軍將領的驕傲。\\n\\n這些士兵手持弓弩，向敵人發射大量穿甲箭矢。聰明的將軍會用矛兵支援他們，因為他們是敵人騎兵的主要目標。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n Armed with crossbows, these soldiers rain down a hail of armour-piercing missiles on their foes. A wise general will support them with spearmen, as they are a prime target for enemy horsemen.

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老練的西涼軍是大多數軍閥羡慕的對象，也是西涼軍將領的驕傲。\\n\\n像這樣的老練騎兵會以毀滅性的衝鋒打散敵人，而在敵人發動反擊或放箭射他們之前他們已經撤走。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. Skilled horsemen such as these will ride the enemy down in a devastating charge and retreat before the enemy can launch a counterattack, or pepper them with arrows.

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老練的西涼軍是大多數軍閥羡慕的對象，也是西涼軍將領的驕傲。\\n\\n作爲敏捷的騎兵，他們可以很容易地抓住任何走散的敵人。他們的劍和盾牌將允許他們進行短暫的近戰，但之後就需要撤退。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n Swift horsemen, they can easily catch any enemy left out in the open, while their swords and shields will allow them to stay in melee for a while before having to retreat.
Override by key: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老練的西涼軍是大多數軍閥羡慕的對象，也是西涼軍將領的驕傲。\\n\\n作爲敏捷的騎兵，他們可以很容易地抓住任何走散的敵人。他們的劍和盾牌將允許他們進行短暫的近戰，但之後就需要撤退。

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老練的西涼軍是大多數軍閥羡慕的對象，也是西涼軍將領的驕傲。\\n\\n這些馬弓手會模仿他們經常面對的草原部落的戰術，可以熟練地邊射邊跑。他們將攻擊敵人最薄弱的地方，同時會保持距離，沒有弓弩便無法傷害他們。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n Imitating the tactics of the tribes they often face, these horse archers are proficient hit-and-run combatants. They will strike where the enemies are weakest, while remaining out of reach of all weapons, save arrows or crossbow bolts.
Override by key: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老練的西涼軍是大多數軍閥羡慕的對象，也是西涼軍將領的驕傲。\\n\\n這些馬弓手會模仿他們經常面對的草原部落的戰術，可以熟練地邊射邊跑。他們將攻擊敵人最薄弱的地方，同時會保持距離，沒有弓弩便無法傷害他們。

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n每一支軍隊都有自己的精銳，西涼精銳則尤其出色。\\n\\n這些戰士裝備雙手斬馬刀，可以讓任何騎兵的衝鋒陷入死戰，然後輕易地解決掉敵人。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n Every army has their elites: those of the Xiliang army are more so than most. Armed with the two-handed zhanmadao, these warriors can bring any cavalry charge to a brutal standstill and make short work of their foes afterwards.
Override by key: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n每一支軍隊都有自己的精銳，西涼精銳則尤其出色。\\n\\n這些戰士裝備雙手斬馬刀，可以讓任何騎兵的衝鋒陷入死戰，然後輕易地解決掉敵人。

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n每一支軍隊都有自己的精銳，西涼精銳則尤其出色。\\n\\n這些矛兵身穿鐵甲，手持巨盾，將守住任何軍隊的前線並擊退敵兵。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n Every army has their elites: those of the Xiliang army are more so than most. These spearmen, clad in iron armor and wielding great shields, will hold the frontline of any army and drive the enemy back.
Override by key: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n每一支軍隊都有自己的精銳，西涼精銳則尤其出色。\\n\\n這些矛兵身穿鐵甲，手持巨盾，將守住任何軍隊的前線並擊退敵兵。

Text: 如果只有力量才能統治，那麼就必須經常充分地展現這樣的力量。必須用那些不信的傻瓜們來罰一儆百。\\n\\n這些經過西涼訓練的戰士，是董卓與呂布强加於漢朝的鐵腕統治的中堅力量。\\n\\n他們弓劍嫻熟，經常上街巡邏，平息騷亂。
English: If only strength can rule, then strength must be displayed often and in great abundance. And it must be used to make an example of fools who would believe otherwise. \\n\\n Trained in the Xiliang style of warfare, these disciplined warriors form the backbone of the ironfisted rule that Dong Zhuo and Lu Bu impose upon the Han. Skilled with both the bow and the sword, they habitually patrol the streets to put down any unrest.
Override by key: 如果只有力量才能統治，那麼就必須經常充分地展現這樣的力量。必須用那些不信的傻瓜們來罰一儆百。\\n\\n這些經過西涼訓練的戰士，是董卓與呂布强加於漢朝的鐵腕統治的中堅力量。\\n\\n他們弓劍嫻熟，經常上街巡邏，平息騷亂。

Text: 如果只有力量才能統治，那麼就必須經常充分地展現這樣的力量。必須用那些不信的傻瓜們來罰一儆百。\\n\\n這些經過西涼訓練的戰士，是董卓與呂布强加於漢朝的鐵腕統治的中堅力量。\\n\\n他們騎馬在鄉間巡邏，用弓劍擊倒任何敵人。
English: If only strength can rule, then strength must be displayed often and in great abundance. And it must be used to make example of fools who would believe otherwise. \\n\\n Trained in the Xiliang style of warfare, these disciplined warriors form the backbone of the ironfisted rule that Dong Zhuo and Lu Bu impose upon the Han. Atop their steeds, they patrol the countryside, putting down any opposition with bow and sword.
Override by key: 如果只有力量才能統治，那麼就必須經常充分地展現這樣的力量。必須用那些不信的傻瓜們來罰一儆百。\\n\\n這些經過西涼訓練的戰士，是董卓與呂布强加於漢朝的鐵腕統治的中堅力量。\\n\\n他們騎馬在鄉間巡邏，用弓劍擊倒任何敵人。

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n每一支軍隊都有自己的精銳，西涼精銳則尤其出色。\\n\\n這些士兵身著重甲，戰馬同樣披著馬甲，他們是西涼最强的戰士。雖然行動緩慢，但當他們沖進敵人陣型，踐踏和刺殺敵人時，幾乎沒有人能抵抗他們。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n Every army has their elites: those of the Xiliang army are more so than most. These warriors, clad in heavy armor and riding equally armoured steeds, are the best the Xiliang have to offer. Though slow in maneuvers, almost none can oppose them as they charge into enemy ranks, trampling and goring their enemies on their spears.
Override by key: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n每一支軍隊都有自己的精銳，西涼精銳則尤其出色。\\n\\n這些士兵身著重甲，戰馬同樣披著馬甲，他們是西涼最强的戰士。雖然行動緩慢，但當他們沖進敵人陣型，踐踏和刺殺敵人時，幾乎沒有人能抵抗他們。

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n每一支軍隊都有自己的精銳，西涼精銳則尤其出色。\\n\\n這些弩手是反騎兵專家。即使是强大的遊牧鐵騎也會避開他們。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n Every army has their elites: those of the Xiliang army are more so than most. These crossbowmen are anti-cavalry specialists. Even the powerful nomadic cataphracts shun them.
Override by key: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n每一支軍隊都有自己的精銳，西涼精銳則尤其出色。\\n\\n這些弩手是反騎兵專家。即使是强大的遊牧鐵騎也會避開他們。

Text: 在這片土地上培養出來的士兵是楚國舊王朝的繼承人，他們有著共同的氣質：鬥志昂揚，忠貞不渝。他們是使任何軍閥或皇帝適意的戰鬥力量。\\n\\n這些戰士携帶蒺藜，設下看不見的陷阱來阻礙敵人前進。任何倖存者都會很快被這些戰士的利刃處理掉。一個熟練的將軍會小心防備弓箭手：他們的盔甲很輕，沒有盾牌。
English: Heirs of the old dynasty of Chu, the soldiers bred by this land share its temperament: fierce in battle and loyal to the end. They are a fitting fighting force for any warlord or would-be emperor. \\n\\n These warriors bring caltrops to battle, stunting any enemy advance as the foe perishes on the unseen traps. Any survivors are quickly dealt with by the blades these warriors wield. A skilled general would be wary of archers though: they are lightly armored and carry no shield.
Override by key: 在這片土地上培養出來的士兵是楚國舊王朝的繼承人，他們有著共同的氣質：鬥志昂揚，忠貞不渝。他們是使任何軍閥或皇帝適意的戰鬥力量。\\n\\n這些戰士携帶蒺藜，設下看不見的陷阱來阻礙敵人前進。任何倖存者都會很快被這些戰士的利刃處理掉。一個熟練的將軍會小心防備弓箭手：他們的盔甲很輕，沒有盾牌。

Text: 在這片土地上培養出來的士兵是楚國舊王朝的繼承人，他們有著共同的氣質：鬥志昂揚，忠貞不渝。他們是使任何軍閥或皇帝適意的戰鬥力量。\\n\\n長斧令人望而生畏，尤其是在這樣一個好戰的民族手中。他們被認為是優秀的突擊步兵，輕易砍裂盾牌和盔甲，重振他們的古代王朝的榮耀。
English: Heirs of the old dynasty of Chu, the soldiers bred by this land share its temperament: fierce in battle and loyal to the end. They are a fitting fighting force for any warlord or would-be emperor. \\n\\n Long axes are intimidating to behold, especially in the hand of such a warlike people. Rending shields and armor alike, they are known to be good shock infantry that echo the glory of their ancient dynasty.
Override by key: 在這片土地上培養出來的士兵是楚國舊王朝的繼承人，他們有著共同的氣質：鬥志昂揚，忠貞不渝。他們是使任何軍閥或皇帝適意的戰鬥力量。\\n\\n長斧令人望而生畏，尤其是在這樣一個好戰的民族手中。他們被認為是優秀的突擊步兵，輕易砍裂盾牌和盔甲，重振他們的古代王朝的榮耀。

Text: 在這片土地上培養出來的士兵是楚國舊王朝的繼承人，他們有著共同的氣質：鬥志昂揚，忠貞不渝。他們是使任何軍閥或皇帝適意的戰鬥力量。\\n\\n這些士兵使用長矛和盾牌，為他們的軍隊形成一道防禦屏障，抵禦騎兵衝鋒。他們的盔甲比其他大多數軍隊都輕，但這使他們更加機動：許多騎兵被突如其來的荊楚矛兵打了個措手不及！
English: Heirs of the old dynasty of Chu, the soldiers bred by this land share its temperament: fierce in battle and loyal to the end. They are a fitting fighting force for any warlord or would-be emperor. \\n\\n Wielding spear and shield, these soldiers form a defensive screen for their army against calvary charges. Their armor is lighter than most other armies, but this makes them more mobile: many horsemen have been taken off-guard by a sudden rush of Jingchu Spearmen!
Override by key: 在這片土地上培養出來的士兵是楚國舊王朝的繼承人，他們有著共同的氣質：鬥志昂揚，忠貞不渝。他們是使任何軍閥或皇帝適意的戰鬥力量。\\n\\n這些士兵使用長矛和盾牌，為他們的軍隊形成一道防禦屏障，抵禦騎兵衝鋒。他們的盔甲比其他大多數軍隊都輕，但這使他們更加機動：許多騎兵被突如其來的荊楚矛兵打了個措手不及！

Text: 在這片土地上培養出來的士兵是楚國舊王朝的繼承人，他們有著共同的氣質：鬥志昂揚，忠貞不渝。他們是使任何軍閥或皇帝適意的戰鬥力量。\\n\\n這些人是熟練的弓箭手，可以靈活地移動到最有利的位置為他們的軍隊提供掩護火力。然而他們需要保護免受騎兵攻擊，因為他們只有輕護甲。
English: Heirs of the old dynasty of Chu, the soldiers bred by this land share its temperament: fierce in battle and loyal to the end. They are a fitting fighting force for any warlord or would-be emperor. \\n\\n Skilled archers, these men provide covering fire for their army as they maneuver nimbly into the most advantageous positions. They should be protected from cavalry however, as they are lightly armoured.
Override by key: 在這片土地上培養出來的士兵是楚國舊王朝的繼承人，他們有著共同的氣質：鬥志昂揚，忠貞不渝。他們是使任何軍閥或皇帝適意的戰鬥力量。\\n\\n這些人是熟練的弓箭手，可以靈活地移動到最有利的位置為他們的軍隊提供掩護火力。然而他們需要保護免受騎兵攻擊，因為他們只有輕護甲。

Text: 這些騎手名聲遠揚。為了與北方部落作戰，公孫瓚打造了一支自己的騎兵部隊。這些戰士跟隨他們的領軍作戰，對抗部落或其他漢室之敵……\\n\\n他們使用劍和盾牌，身穿重甲，能夠承受連續的箭雨，然後沖入近戰，留在那裡守住陣綫，等待其他軍隊消滅敵人。
English: The fame of these horsemen reaches far. To fight the northern tribes, Gongsun Zan has created a skilled cavalry force of his own to match. These warriors follow their leader into battle, against the tribes or any other foe of the Han… \\n\\n Wielding sword and shield and clad in heavy armor, they can easily weather a barrage of arrows, before charging into melee and remaining there to hold the line as the rest of the army finishes the enemy.
Override by key: 這些騎手名聲遠揚。為了與北方部落作戰，公孫瓚打造了一支自己的騎兵部隊。這些戰士跟隨他們的領軍作戰，對抗部落或其他漢室之敵……\\n\\n他們使用劍和盾牌，身穿重甲，能夠承受連續的箭雨，然後沖入近戰，留在那裡守住陣綫，等待其他軍隊消滅敵人。

Text: 這些騎手名聲遠揚。為了與北方部落作戰，公孫瓚打造了一支自己的騎兵部隊。這些戰士跟隨他們的領軍作戰，對抗部落或其他漢室之敵……\\n\\n這些裝甲戰士手持長矛和盾牌，沖向戰場，用他們的長矛刺穿敵人。他們只需要提防敵人的矛兵和弓弩手。
English: The fame of these horsemen reaches far. To fight the northern tribes, Gongsun Zan has created a skilled cavalry force of his own to match. These warriors follow their leader into battle, against the tribes or any other foe of the Han… \\n\\n Wielding a long spear and shield, these armored warriors charge into battle, skewering the foe with their lances. They only need to be wary of enemy spearmen and sustained archer fire.
Override by key: 這些騎手名聲遠揚。為了與北方部落作戰，公孫瓚打造了一支自己的騎兵部隊。這些戰士跟隨他們的領軍作戰，對抗部落或其他漢室之敵……\\n\\n這些裝甲戰士手持長矛和盾牌，沖向戰場，用他們的長矛刺穿敵人。他們只需要提防敵人的矛兵和弓弩手。

Text: 汉德虽衰，餘威猶存。這些戰士為陳王劉寵效勞。他們身穿金漆鎧甲，在戰場上形成一道璀璨的風景，提醒世人，只要他們還站著，漢室就還沒有消亡。\\n\\n這些士兵從陳王那裡得到了精美的盔甲，他們熟練地揮舞著他們的長戟來保衛漢室。作為一支紀律嚴明的部隊，他們向敵人挺進，來見證漢室的輝煌。
English: Even as the Han crumbles, embers of its glory remain. These warriors serve the prince of Chenliu, Liu Chong. Clad in gold-lacquered armor, they form a resplendiscent sight on the battlefield, reminding all that the fortunes of the Han have not yet faded while these men stand firm. \\n\\n Gifted with fine armor from their prince, these soldiers expertly wield their halberds in defence of the Han. Advancing on their foe as a disciplined unit, they are a living reminder to the greatness of the Han.
Override by key: 汉德虽衰，餘威猶存。這些戰士為陳王劉寵效勞。他們身穿金漆鎧甲，在戰場上形成一道璀璨的風景，提醒世人，只要他們還站著，漢室就還沒有消亡。\\n\\n這些士兵從陳王那裡得到了精美的盔甲，他們熟練地揮舞著他們的長戟來保衛漢室。作為一支紀律嚴明的部隊，他們向敵人挺進，來見證漢室的輝煌。

Text: 汉德虽衰，餘威猶存。這些戰士為陳王劉寵效勞。他們身穿金漆鎧甲，在戰場上形成一道璀璨的風景，提醒世人，只要他們還站著，漢室就還沒有消亡。\\n\\n這些特殊的士兵裝備著弩箭，可以用穿甲弩矢無情地對漢室的敵人進行猛烈的炮擊。如果敵人的騎兵想衝鋒，他們會有一個不愉快的驚喜：這些戰士還裝備著長矛和盾牌，會毫不猶豫地擊倒任何靠近的騎兵！
English: Even as the Han crumbles, embers of its glory remain. These warriors serve the prince of Chenliu, Liu Chong. Clad in gold-lacquered armor, they form a resplendiscent sight on the battlefield, reminding all that the fortunes of the Han have not yet faded while these men stand firm.\\n\\n These particular soldiers are armed with crossbows, allowing them to barrage the enemies of the Han relentlessly with volley after volley of armour-piercing bolts. Should the enemy cavalry think to charge, they are in for an unpleasant surprise: these warriors also wield spears and shields and will not hesitate to strike down any horseman who comes too close!
Override by key: 汉德虽衰，餘威猶存。這些戰士為陳王劉寵效勞。他們身穿金漆鎧甲，在戰場上形成一道璀璨的風景，提醒世人，只要他們還站著，漢室就還沒有消亡。\\n\\n這些特殊的士兵裝備著弩箭，可以用穿甲弩矢無情地對漢室的敵人進行猛烈的炮擊。如果敵人的騎兵想衝鋒，他們會有一個不愉快的驚喜：這些戰士還裝備著長矛和盾牌，會毫不猶豫地擊倒任何靠近的騎兵！

Text: 汉德虽衰，餘威猶存。這些戰士為陳王劉寵效勞。他們身穿金漆鎧甲，在戰場上形成一道璀璨的風景，提醒世人，只要他們還站著，漢室就還沒有消亡。\\n\\n這些禁衛軍是他們盟友的希望。每人都被賜予良馬重甲，受過各種武器的訓練，從弓弩到劍盾，也都是經過許多戰鬥的老兵。
English: Even as the Han crumbles, embers of its glory remain. These warriors serve the prince of Chenliu, Liu Chong. Clad in gold-lacquered armor, they form a resplendiscent sight on the battlefield, reminding all that the fortunes of the Han have not yet faded while these men stand firm. \\n\\n These royal guards are a beacon of hope to their allies. Gifted with fine steeds to ride, and clad in the heaviest armour availible from the princely armouries, each man has been trained in a myriad of weapons, from crossbow to the noble Jian sword and shield and is a veteran of many battles.
Override by key: 汉德虽衰，餘威猶存。這些戰士為陳王劉寵效勞。他們身穿金漆鎧甲，在戰場上形成一道璀璨的風景，提醒世人，只要他們還站著，漢室就還沒有消亡。\\n\\n這些禁衛軍是他們盟友的希望。每人都被賜予良馬重甲，受過各種武器的訓練，從弓弩到劍盾，也都是經過許多戰鬥的老兵。

Text: Treat your men as you would your own beloved sons. And they will follow you into the deepest valley. \\n\\n Serving the heirs of Sun Tzu, these men would willingly follow them into heirs and certain death. Armed with a light glaive and medium armor, these men can hold their own in a variety of situations, facing down cavalry or infantry with equal skill. Their versatility has caused them to be fondly called “problem solvers” by their commanders and are given great respect, which they repay with loyalty.
English: Treat your men as you would your own beloved sons. And they will follow you into the deepest valley. \\n\\n Serving the heirs of Sun Tzu, these men would willingly follow them into heirs and certain death. Armed with a light glaive and medium armor, these men can hold their own in a variety of situations, facing down cavalry or infantry with equal skill. Their versatility has caused them to be fondly called “problem solvers” by their commanders and are given great respect, which they repay with loyalty.

Text: Move swift as the Wind and closely-formed as the Wood. Attack like the Fire and be still as the Mountain. \\n\\n These elite soldiers hail from Danyang province and are rapidly gaining renown with commanders in the crumbling Han empire. Armed with a glaive and heavy armor, they have gathered a reputation assaulting enemy strongpoints succesfully and routing their defenders. \\n\\n Already, enemies have learned to fear their expertise, as well as the gunpowder bombs they carry with them. When the Blue Turbans have been spotted on the field, the foe knows their days are numbered.
English: Move swift as the Wind and closely-formed as the Wood. Attack like the Fire and be still as the Mountain. \\n\\n These elite soldiers hail from Danyang province and are rapidly gaining renown with commanders in the crumbling Han empire. Armed with a glaive and heavy armor, they have gathered a reputation assaulting enemy strongpoints succesfully and routing their defenders. \\n\\n Already, enemies have learned to fear their expertise, as well as the gunpowder bombs they carry with them. When the Blue Turbans have been spotted on the field, the foe knows their days are numbered.

Text: The Yuan clan's fame brings many benefits, one of which the number of men willing to lay down their lives in their service. \\n\\n Wielding the noble Jian blade, and protected by stout shields and good armour, these swordsmen will defend their masters with zeal. They form the frontline of the Yuan battleline, chopping and slashing at their foe until either they or themselves are slain.
English: The Yuan clan's fame brings many benefits, one of which the number of men willing to lay down their lives in their service. \\n\\n Wielding the noble Jian blade, and protected by stout shields and good armour, these swordsmen will defend their masters with zeal. They form the frontline of the Yuan battleline, chopping and slashing at their foe until either they or themselves are slain.

Text: With the many wars that ravage China, militias everywhere have sprung up to defend their home and livelihood from bandits, yellow turbans, and invading warlords. Tempered by hard-won experience, these men have become adepts at war by survival.  Equally skilled in melee as with the bow, they over time bought horses to level the playing field with the more professional troops they often face. Many of these veterans now flock to the banners of the warlords, providing a rapid response force fit for a variety of situations.
English: With the many wars that ravage China, militias everywhere have sprung up to defend their home and livelihood from bandits, yellow turbans, and invading warlords. Tempered by hard-won experience, these men have become adepts at war by survival.  Equally skilled in melee as with the bow, they over time bought horses to level the playing field with the more professional troops they often face. Many of these veterans now flock to the banners of the warlords, providing a rapid response force fit for a variety of situations.

Text: Recruited by Liu Bei during his time as "General of the Left", these soldiers now are loyal to their general and will fight to see his vision fulfilled. The Han shall be restored, and they will unleash a barrage of arrows upon any rebel who would see the Han extinguished. And And if their foes would close the distance, they shall find that they are equally skilled in melee combat, unless they fight cavalry.
English: Recruited by Liu Bei during his time as "General of the Left", these soldiers now are loyal to their general and will fight to see his vision fulfilled. The Han shall be restored, and they will unleash a barrage of arrows upon any rebel who would see the Han extinguished. And And if their foes would close the distance, they shall find that they are equally skilled in melee combat, unless they fight cavalry.

Text: 黃巾起義和迅速瓦解的漢朝，使許多人失去了家園和生計。這些人中最絕望或最不謹慎的人都變成了強盜。這些人加入黑山王的土匪，希望通過燒殺掠奪來重獲財富。儘管他們抱有希望，但他們糟糕的裝備通常讓他們只能做擋箭牌，而其他人則會因他們的犧牲而收穫回報。
English: The Yellow Turban rebellion and the rapidly collapsing Han dynasty has left many people without homes or livelihoods. The most desperate or least scrupulous of these turn to banditry. These men flock to the bandit of the king of Black Mountain, hoping to remake their fortunes through plunder and bloody battle. Despite their hopes, their poor equipment usually has them end up as fodder, while others reap the rewards for their sacrifices.

Text: 黃巾起義和迅速瓦解的漢朝，使許多人失去了家園和生計。這些人中最絕望或最不謹慎的人都變成了強盜。這些人加入盜賊女王麾下，希望通過燒殺掠奪來重獲財富。儘管他們抱有希望，但他們糟糕的裝備通常讓他們只能做擋箭牌，而其他人則會因他們的犧牲而收穫回報。
English: The Yellow Turban rebellion and the rapidly collapsing Han dynasty has left many people without homes or livelihoods. The most desperate or least scrupulous of these turn to banditry. These men flock to the self-proclaimed bandit queen, hoping to remake their fortunes through plunder and bloody battle. Despite their hopes, their poor equipment usually has them end up as fodder, while others reap the rewards for their sacrifices.

Text: Born from refugees and those peoples who would not submit to the Han empire, these White Tiger Strays have thrown their lot with Yan Baihu, hoping to safeguard their independance. Wearing bad equipment, the most valuable thing they offer to their commanders is their lives; to sell dearly as better men win the battle for them.
English: Born from refugees and those peoples who would not submit to the Han empire, these White Tiger Strays have thrown their lot with Yan Baihu, hoping to safeguard their independance. Wearing bad equipment, the most valuable thing they offer to their commanders is their lives; to sell dearly as better men win the battle for them.

Text: Whereas some cavalry bring a primal, instantly shattering force to the battlefield, other mounted warriors are suited to the slower burn, embroiling themselves in the melee and staying to continue inflicting casualties. \\n\\n Whilst they get less power on the charge, their destructive capability increases dramatically once they begin hacking away at foes.
English: Whereas some cavalry bring a primal, instantly shattering force to the battlefield, other mounted warriors are suited to the slower burn, embroiling themselves in the melee and staying to continue inflicting casualties. \\n\\n Whilst they get less power on the charge, their destructive capability increases dramatically once they begin hacking away at foes.

Text: The bandit queen's forces are bolstered by the presence of these so-called "phantoms". Hailing from Taishan, these warriors have already gathered an ominous reputation for the poison bombs they carry with them. If the wind is right, these bombs will cause entire regiments to choke without even comitting to battle. They are furthermore armed with a light sword and cloth armor, so they should not be relied on to hold the line in melee.
English: The bandit queen's forces are bolstered by the presence of these so-called "phantoms". Hailing from Taishan, these warriors have already gathered an ominous reputation for the poison bombs they carry with them. If the wind is right, these bombs will cause entire regiments to choke without even comitting to battle. They are furthermore armed with a light sword and cloth armor, so they should not be relied on to hold the line in melee.

Text: Hailing from Taishan, these women have coated their arrow points in a special ointment, made from poisonous herbs native to the region. In battle, A volley from these archers will soon leave the enemy gasping for air as the poison very quickly spreads through their veins. A wise commander will use these soldiers to spread terror through the enemy ranks, yet keep them well-protected: they are vulnerable to cavalry, as their range is limited.

In battle, A volley from these archers will soon leave the enemy gasping for air as the poison very quickly spreads through their veins. Text: Mighty, gnarled monoliths, the imposing peaks of China's south stand like sentinels against the unrelenting waters beyond. Amongst these hills and peaks, the Yue tribes eke out their continued existence; brought low from the once-proud past, they stand now against the threat of Han invasion from the north. Although they wield sword and shield, they are nothing like the professional warriors coming to face them. \\n\\n Yet, united behind one who purports to fight for their ideals, the Yue are able to summon themselves into something resembling their own strength – their legacy demands it!
English: Mighty, gnarled monoliths, the imposing peaks of China's south stand like sentinels against the unrelenting waters beyond. Amongst these hills and peaks, the Yue tribes eke out their continued existence; brought low from the once-proud past, they stand now against the threat of Han invasion from the north. Although they wield sword and shield, they are nothing like the professional warriors coming to face them. \\n\\n Yet, united behind one who purports to fight for their ideals, the Yue are able to summon themselves into something resembling their own strength – their legacy demands it!

Text: The nomads of the steppes have a reputation for fine horsemanship. These particular horse archers have turned to banditry and pillaging to fill their coffers. They will allign themselves to bandit chiefs of note, who can afford their services by giving them a proportional share of the loot. In battle, they harass the enemy from afar, using their horses to quickly wheel about when the counter-attack comes.
English: The nomads of the steppes have a reputation for fine horsemanship. These particular horse archers have turned to banditry and pillaging to fill their coffers. They will allign themselves to bandit chiefs of note, who can afford their services by giving them a proportional share of the loot. In battle, they harass the enemy from afar, using their horses to quickly wheel about when the counter-attack comes.

Text: The typical bandit force consists of lightly armored troops. These men are not a typical bandit force. A string of victories or lucky looting has netted them the excellent armour wielded by the heavy troops of the Han empire. They now form a heavy spear unit, capable of holding their ground against even the dreaded barded horsemen. With these men, any aspiring bandit warlord may find himself a bandit king or queen, one day.
English: The typical bandit force consists of lightly armored troops. These men are not a typical bandit force. A string of victories or lucky looting has netted them the excellent armour wielded by the heavy troops of the Han empire. They now form a heavy spear unit, capable of holding their ground against even the dreaded barded horsemen. With these men, any aspiring bandit warlord may find himself a bandit king or queen, one day.

Text: Zheng Jiang has selected her most ferocious bandits to act as her ‘Fists of the Bandit Queen’; their role is to act as shock-troops, sneaking behind enemy lines to terrify foes with surprise attacks early in the battle. \\n\\n Each carries a heavy fu axe in each hand, and the wounds dealt by them can be catastrophic. Striking terror requires these troops to be without fear themselves, but also means they can tend to be undisciplined and difficult to control once their blood is hot with battle

Text: Having fled from their homes, these craftsmen and artisans turn their skills to the defence of their new home and master. \\n\\n Having been selected as the brightest from the many refugees flooding his lands, these engineers serve Tao Qian to the best of their ability. Wielding crossbows, they provide support from afar and will deploy smoke bombs and caltrops when an enemy strays too close. However, these men are not proper soldiers and should not be relied upon to hold the line in melee.

However, these men are not proper soldiers and should not be relied upon to hold the line in melee.

Text: Sun Tzu said that one should always give an enemy room to escape, so that they do not fight with the fervour of the doomed. Yet for Gao Shun's elite force, Xian Chen Ying, being entirely surrounded is nothing but another dimension to slaughter. \\n\\n Renowned for their abilitiy to smash through enemy formations, Xian Chen Ying excel even when surrounded. The bodies will pile high, but Xian Chen Ying will still emerge from the pile victorious.

Text: 西涼精銳長槍鐵甲騎兵
Mapped by text: 西涼精銳長槍鐵甲騎兵

Override by key: 乾天衛
坤地衛

Text: 北軍老練長槍鐵甲騎兵
Mapped by text: 北軍老練長槍鐵甲騎兵

English: Sword Guards of the Eight Talents
Ji Guards of the Eight Talents
This unit's arrows spew clouds of deadly gas on impact.

Text: 以如震天雷響與其火焰爆破震攝敵軍。
English: Thunderous sounds and exploding flames agitate the enemy.
Exact: 以如震天雷響與其火焰爆破震攝敵軍。

English: This unit can't shoot very far.

Text: 他們可對敵人進行挑釁。
Exact: 他們可對敵人進行挑釁。

Text: 這些士兵只順從自己的喜好。他們在戰場上可能會恣意妄為，不聽命令自行進攻！
English: These soldiers obey only their own passions. They may charge without orders and act erratically on the battlefield!
Vanilla: 這些士兵只順從自己的喜好。他們在戰場上可能會恣意妄為，不聽命令自行進攻！
Exact: 有什麼使他們喪失理智。

Text: 此單位可對持盾敵人造成額外傷害。
English: This unit causes extra damage against shielded enemies.
Vanilla: 此單位可對持盾敵人造成額外傷害。

Text: 他們可以在奔跑時進行射擊。
English: This unit can fire on the move.
Exact: 他們可以在奔跑時進行射擊。

Text: 此單位的武器可以穿透最强的護甲。
English: This unit's weapon allows it to pierce even the strongest enemy armour.
Mapped by text: 此單位的武器可以穿透最强的護甲。

Text: 此弓威力非凡。射程雖短，但具穿甲威力。
English: Their heavy metal bows are short-ranged but can pierce through enemies.
Exact: 此弓威力非凡。射程雖短，但具穿甲威力。

Text: 擊射響箭，驚嚇所經路徑上的敵軍。
English: This unit fires whistling arrows that demoralise enemies along their trajectory.
Exact: 擊射響箭，驚嚇所經路徑上的敵軍。

Text: 當在近戰失利時，此單位將引爆自身。
English: These fanatics will blow themselves up when they're in a losing battle.
Exact: 當在近戰失利時，此單位將引爆自身。

Text: 擊射特殊松香油箭，使目標更易焚燒。
English: This unit's sticky rosin arrows cling to their targets, making them vulnerable to flames.
Exact: 擊射特殊松香油箭，使目標更易焚燒。

Text: 命中率一般，穿甲傷害高
English: Average Hit Rate, High Armour-Piercing Damage
Mapped by text: 命中率一般，穿甲傷害高
Exact: Excels at attacking unarmoured opponents, but very vulnerable to cavalry charges.
Excels at attacking unarmoured opponents, but vulnerable to missile attacks.
Excels at attacking unarmoured opponents, but vulnerable to missile attacks.

Text: 遠距，穿甲傷害低，射擊速率快
English: Long Range, Low Armour-Piercing Damage, Fast Reload
Mapped by text: 遠距，穿甲傷害低，射擊速率快
Exact: Excels at wearing down enemies without shields, but vulnerable in melee.
Excels at holding the line especially at chokepoints, but has very low damage.
Best used to counter missile units, but vulnerable in melee.

Text: 命中率一般，穿甲傷害一般
English: Average Hit Rate, Average Armour-Piercing Damage
Mapped by text: 命中率一般，穿甲傷害一般
Exact: Excels at head-on assaults against the enemy frontline, but very vulnerable to cavalry charges.

Text: 命中率低，穿甲傷害高，破盾
English: Low Hit Rate, High Armour-Piercing Damage, Break Enemy's Shield
Mapped by text: 命中率低，穿甲傷害高，破盾

Text: 英雄的決心並非裝模作樣，而是發自內心的勇氣。

Text: 兵不厭詐，謀如湧泉，則手下士兵無堅不摧。

Text: 正在舉行皇家祭祀儀式……

Text: 正在舉行皇家祭祀儀式……
English: An imperial ancestral rite is being held...
Mapped by text: 正在舉行皇家祭祀儀式……

English: It seems you've offended the imperial court...
It seems you've offended the imperial court...

Text: 即將舉行的皇家祭祀儀式是朝中的一項重大活動。詔書要求您派文官去協助行政事務，或派武官去協助禁衛。如果您盡忠職守，朝廷會給予賞賜。拒不執行，則可能招致天子的不滿。
English: The imperial ancestral rite, a significant event in China, will be held soon. An imperial decree demands that you send civil officials to assist in administrative affairs or military officers for the imperial guard detail. If you fulfill your duties as a faithful servant, the imperial court will grant you grace. If you refuse, you may incurr the emperor's disfavour...
Override by key: 即將舉行的皇家祭祀儀式是朝中的一項重大活動。詔書要求您派文官去協助行政事務，或派武官去協助禁衛。如果您盡忠職守，朝廷會給予賞賜。拒不執行，則可能招致天子的不滿。

Text: 朝廷下達了一道詔書，將在皇宮設宴邀請天下有影響力的貴族。这恐怕是輔政大臣因爲擔心我們的影響力設下的计谋，但违背诏书可能會有嚴重後果……
English: A decree has arrived from the imperial court. A banquet is to be held, and influential nobles from across China are invited to the imperial palace. Wary of our influence, the imperial protector may be plotting something. However, refusing an imperial decree may have grave consequences...
Override by key: 朝廷下達了一道詔書，將在皇宮設宴邀請天下有影響力的貴族。这恐怕是輔政大臣因爲擔心我們的影響力設下的计谋，但违背诏书可能會有嚴重後果……

Text: 天子對你甚有好感，决定給你一些賞賜，來表彰你對朝廷的貢獻。
English: The emperor thinks highly of you. His majesty has decided to gift you a small fortune in honour of your contributions to the state.
Mapped by text: 天子對你甚有好感，决定給你一些賞賜，來表彰你對朝廷的貢獻。

English: Imperial Favour: A Gift from the Emperor

Text: 也許是出於欽佩，也許是向您示好，有一勢力在皇帝面前爲你多加褒詞。最近在宮中人人都在談論您的功績。
English: Perhaps out of admiration or to curry favour, a faction has put in a good word for you with the emperor. Talk of your exploits is is all that is on everyone's lips at the palace of late.
Mapped by text: 也許是出於欽佩，也許是向您示好，有一勢力在皇帝面前爲你多加褒詞。最近在宮中人人都在談論您的功績。

Text: 誹謗！一個敵對的軍閥在朝廷散佈惡意的謠言，使獻帝懷疑我們對大漢的忠誠。
English: Slander! A rival warlord is spreading malicious rumours at the imperial court, causing Emperor Xian to doubt our loyalty to the Han.
Mapped by text: 誹謗！一個敵對的軍閥在朝廷散佈惡意的謠言，使獻帝懷疑我們對大漢的忠誠。

Text: 皇家宴會結束，並無意外發生
Mapped by text: 皇家宴會結束，並無意外發生

Text: 幸運的是，宴會中沒發生什麼大事。
English: Fortunately, nothing of note happened during the banquet.
Mapped by text: 幸運的是，宴會中沒發生什麼大事。

Text: 皇家祭祀儀式順利完成，但天子一言不發便回宮了。
English: The imperial ancestral rite ended without incident. Unfortunately, the emperor returned to the place without acknowledging your contribution.
Mapped by text: 皇家祭祀儀式順利完成，但天子一言不發便回宮了。

Text: 陰謀！有人於宴會中欲加害於你。事雖未成，但刺客已被护卫弑杀，無法得知是誰在背後主謀。
English: A cowardly conspiracy! There was a failed attempt to assassinate you during the banquet. Unfortunately, the assaliant was slain by the guards before he could be made to reveal the conspirator's identity.
Mapped by text: 陰謀！有人於宴會中欲加害於你。事雖未成，但刺客已被护卫弑杀，無法得知是誰在背後主謀。

Text: 皇家祭祀儀式圓滿完成，天子對到場的貴族示恩。
English: The imperial ancestral rite was completed successfully, and the emperor shows favour to the attending nobles.
Mapped by text: 皇家祭祀儀式圓滿完成，天子對到場的貴族示恩。

Text: 選取之後將會打開朝廷權謀面板，統管獻帝於公元195年成年後開放使用的所有機制，代表著新任皇權所面臨的政治角力。
English: Selecting this will open the Imperial Intrigue panel, which governs all the mechanics which become active once Emperor Xian comes of age in 195 CE, introducing a struggle over the influence of the new imperial power.
Mapped by text: 選取之後將會打開朝廷權謀面板，統管獻帝於公元195年成年後開放使用的所有機制，代表著新任皇權所面臨的政治角力。

Text: 假如公元195年後象徵性的皇帝依然在位，到時候朝廷權謀面板將會解除鎖定。
